name: Deck of the Dead
description: "Deck of the Dead" is a thrilling roguelike deckbuilder game set in a dark, mysterious world of vampires. Players will take on the role of a powerful vampire on a quest for ultimate power as they build their deck, defeat enemies, and explore a randomly generated world filled with danger and secrets.

name: Slobbish Dragon Princess 3
description: Peace has more or less returned as humankind and dragonkind learn to coexist with each other. With the town summer festival approaching soon, Takeru would prefer that things stay the way they are. As expected, a new threat approaches in the form of Mei, the dragon princess of the Nether!

name: Aniballs
description: Aniballs is a racing game where you control small animals in balls and race. Players roll through unique 2D circuits with a side camera and can throw objects such as spears, bombs, or time stops at each other!

name: The Longest Dungeon
description: The Longest Dungeon is a infinite, dungeon crawler, beat em' up , roguelike, action, game.

name: Terminal Velocity: Boosted Edition
description: In the far future, armadas from surrounding systems have suddenly waged war on Earth. You are a pilot from the Ares Squadron, flying the fastest, most dangerous crafts ever made. You're outgunned, outmanned, and strapped into a flying coffin.

name: Goi: Let's Play Together
description: Goi: Let's Play Together is an online multiplayer game that combines the elements of Battle Royale and Casual then becomes a Party Survival Game. There will be only one winner in Goi.Try your best to survive the ghost hunt, but OH! Your friends are ghosts too!

name: WWE 2K23: Deluxe Edition
description:
The value of WWE 2K23 is Even Stronger with the Deluxe Edition*!

The Deluxe Edition includes:

• Pre-Order Bonus Pack
• Season Pass: Includes all 5 post-launch DLC character packs, the MyRISE Mega-Boost pack, with 200 additional Attribute Points, and the Supercharger pack which unlocks all base-game WWE Legends and throwback arenas. Release timing of the DLC contents will be revealed at a future date.
• Bonus MyFACTION Content: Includes a John Cena EVO card, Emerald-tier Bianca Belair, and Gold-tier Asuka and Edge cards, plus 3 Basic Day 1 MyFACTION card packs
• 3-Day Early Access

name: Stellaris: First Contact
description: You are not alone! The galaxy is vast and full of wonders, but it’s also full of alien empires you’re going to encounter, whether you’re ready or not. First Contact offers a set of new origins and mechanics that give players the chance to tell stories about their civilizations’ early encounters with visitors from the stars — ones that may not have come in peace!

name: Delete After Reading
description: "Delete After Reading" is a game you can read or a book you can play, An adventure game that mixes puzzles and reading to immerse you in a story about friendship and ruling your own destiny.

name: The Wreck
description: The Wreck is a mature 3D visual novel about sisterhood, motherhood, grief and survival. Follow failed screenwriter Junon as she attempts to make it through the most pivotal day in her life. Relive the past, alter the present, and embrace the future - or watch Junon's story end in a wreck.

name: Vernal Edge
description: Vernal Edge is a 2D action-packed Metroidvania featuring an intense combat system, tight platforming sequences and a powerful story of rivalry, revenge and growth.

name: The Forest Cathedral
description: The Forest Cathedral is a first-person psychological thriller set on a remote island. Playing as scientist Rachel Carson, players will slowly uncover the effects of DDT by using advanced environmental technology to solve 2D/3D connected puzzles in this dramatic retelling of Silent Spring.

name: Spin Rhythm XD
description: Enter the Rhythm Dimension! A homage to classic arcade rhythm games, with a modern aesthetic and soundtrack. Match colours and beats, spin, tap, flick and flow through the juiciest beats in the universe. Supports multiple control styles including Midi DJ gear on Steam!

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails to Azure
description: The Legend of Heroes: Trails to Azure is the fifth installment in the main Trails series, serving as a direct sequel to the events of the The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero and the ending to the Crossbell arc. The game follows the Special Support Section with more members and more cases to solve.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Master Flanker
description:
Take your battlefield strategy up a level with the nimble, fast-firing Cromwell B. Team up with your wolfpack and head straight for the enemy's most vulnerable points.

Bundle includes:
• British Tier VI Cromwell B Medium Tank
• Jon “Frosty” May 3D Premium Commander
• Premium Time - 3 Days
• (10) x8 Commander XP Boosters
• (10) x3 Vehicle XP Boosters
• (10) x2 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - First Brawler
description:
Hit hard. Earn big. The heavy armor and high-damage gun of the IS-2 are just what you need to make your mark in any frontline fight.

Bundle includes:
• Soviet Tier VII IS-2 Heavy Tank
• Phantom of Falun 3D Hero Commander
• Premium Time - 30 Days
• (10) x1.25 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Jumpstart
description:
Dive into Cold War mode's gameplay with an excellent all-round support vehicle. The T95E2 '57 has accuracy and penetration values that will do an incredible job at engaging the enemy while you attack from an optimal position.

Bundle includes:
• T95E2 '57 Post-War Era Western Alliance Medium Tank
• Premium Time - 3 Days
• Travis "Sparky" Nelson 3D Premium Commander

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: World of Tanks: Advanced Marksman
description:
Set your sights on glory... and on your enemy targets. This tank destroyer's rate of fire will shred your opponents until nothing's left but piles of scrap metal.

Bundle includes:
• German Tier VII Javelin Krupp-Steyr Waffenträger Tank Destroyer
• Premium Time - 30 Days
• (30) x1.5 Silver Boosters

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own garage slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.

name: Triopticon
description: The story of this visual novel begins with a winter night crime. Detective Yu-chi Fang discovered that the anomaly at the crime scene was related to his own hidden secret. What is abnormal and what is normal? In the end, Yu-chi Fang must face his true feelings and make a choice.

name: Sekiro: Resurrection
description:
Sekiro: Resurrection is a complete overhaul of the base game.
This mod was made for players, even veterans who wish for more content after beating the game.

name: Meta Nanos: Rumble Race
description: Meta Nanos: Rumble Race is an exciting and action-packed game where your Nanos race against other Nanos for the top spots in the weekly leaderboards. Win awesome prices and show your opponents that your Nanos are just faster.

name: Sudoku 23
description: Sudoku 23 is a version of Sudoku that is playable on the NES.

name: Relic
description: Relic, a set of 4 adventurous maps with devious traps in a jungle setting. There's also a fifth thank you map at the end. Difficulties are implemented; UV is pretty nasty so unless you want that kind of heat, give HMP a go!

name: Victoria 3: Melodies for the Masses Music Pack
description: Victoria 3 has a new music pack inspired by the romantic yearnings for those simpler days of working on the land. This nearly hour long collection of original music is a concert honoring the daily struggles and ambitions of the common people.

name: Heelbain
description: Heelbain is a 9-map UDMF WAD focused on dread. The story is simple: you're on an expedition with your wife and friends in the deserts of Nevada. During the night, your camp is attacked is by hellish creatures, and everyone except you is killed. You escape into a local cliff side, hiding until dawn. You venture into what looks like civilization to seek help, but soon, you find yourself heelbain.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Scribes of Fate
description: The Elder Scrolls Online: Scribes of Fate is a DLC for The Elder Scrolls Online. It is the 29th DLC released for the game and continues the year-long Shadow Over Morrowind adventure along with Update 37. Its release date is March 13th, 2023 for PC and Mac, and March 28th, 2023 for Xbox and PlayStation.

name: Shooting Survival
description: This is the 2d shooting game with building and crafting that features extremely easy play styles. Its super cool and enjoyable gameplay, mixed with rogue-like, crafting, and farming elements will get you hooked from the very first shooting run!

name: Cherrywitched!
description: In Cherrywitched! You play as a witch detective for the Council of Witches who’s been struggling with a recent series of missing person cases. One day, you decide to take a break from work to visit your favorite cafe: Cherry Pie’s Cafe! This game takes place in the same universe as my first visual novel Berrywitched! So if you haven't played that game, please consider checking it out.

name: Soothsayer: The Oraclepus Knows All
description: Your destiny has already been decided.

name: See No Fear
description:
A Short 10 Min Creepy Experience.
Bite Size Terrors are small experimental horror experiences.
Each with their own unique genres and styles..

name: Shota Kare!
description: Shota Kare! is a visual novel game.

name: IguaRPG
description: Be an iguana and save the world from evil.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Complete Edition
description:
Draw and Color: Kawaii is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! Use different drawing tools and have some tasty fun!
Coloring books are a great way to spend your time. It is a good way to settle the nerves and relax! It also develops your brain... just like eating fish. Use one of the premade templates or create your own illustrations.

name: True Beauty
description: Make it pop! A 1-on-1 Stylish Puzzle Matching Game True Beauty.

name: The Callisto Protocol: Contagion Bundle
description: Death is only the beginning in Contagion Mode, The Callisto Protocol's ultimate survival horror experience. Fight tactically and use your ammunition wisely - Contagion Mode's difficulty is custom balanced with stronger enemies and limited resources.

name: Juurru
description: Travel through the roots of ancient flora. 24 tiny caves to solve and many many roots to grow!

name: The Lushes Land
description: Explore The Lushes Land and uncover its mysteries in this Action-Adventure spin-off of Tochi! On your adventure, you'll be tasked with finding the lost gems of The Lushes Land! While you're exploring, you'll encounter some of the inhabitants. Most are friendly, others not so much, so be wary while exploring and make sure you don't get lost in the wilderness!

name: Quiz Thiz Italy
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KLAS Airport
description: FeelThere Las Vegas Airport for tower! Simulator 3 - brings you more excitement and will keep you busy controlling with more gates, jets and a very nice modelling, so you can enjoy the immersive simulation.

name: Book Travelers: A Victorian Story
description: Can you save literature's most famous story worlds from ruin?

name: Tomes and Quests: Nemesis Campaign
description: Came back for more? The heroes may have saved the worlds and returned home, but what about their rivals? Their college nemeses are still inside the book, but that just means they are now the most powerful beings left and they are ready to conquer!

name: Derealized
description: Derealized is a choice based game inspired by games such as The Stanley Parable and Undertale. This experience offers 10 different endings for you to explore! How many will you find?

name: Castle Rush Zombies
description: Castle Rush Zombies is a tower defense game about defending your own castle during a zombie apocalypse. You'll need to build your economy to produce supplies to ensure good defense

name: Royal Jigsaw 3
description: New King size jigsaw! There are more excellent images this time - 1000 puzzles for you! Each image is still in high quality.

name: As Talk as Walk Wayfarer Team: Land of Music
description: A adventure game. Wayfarer Team, received the princess of the Land of Music invitation, set foot on an unknown adventure.

name: Dark Desire Mute 3
description: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: Vona: She
description: Perform an Ukrainian housewife's life attempting to breaking the daily life loop

name: Wizard of Wyndmoor
description: Wizard of Wyndmoor is a wizard survival game for Windows, Mac and Linux

name: Yondu's Journey
description: Join legendary warrior Yondu in this interactive fmv adventure as he battles for survival in hostile territory. With his cunning, strength, and unwavering spirit, Yondu rises above adversity in this epic tale of survival and adventure. Get ready for an unforgettable journey with Yondu the Fearless!

name: Victoria 3: Update 1.2
description:
Update 1.2 comes with the following updates:

- New Features
- Improvements and bug fixes
- Interface

name: Girls Tennis League
description: The Steam version of the popular 3D independent tennis game "Girls Tennis League" is now online! Real tennis action, supports up to 4 players local doubles and online match, fully supports controller operation, permanent update, and many functions waiting for you to experience.

name: Hentai Galaxy
description: Hentai is not just 2D girls, this is a whole art. And in this art units understand.

name: Cosmic Holes
description: Cosmic Holes is a logic puzzle game based on the 5 elements of Chinese cosmology: Wood, Fire, Earth, Metal, and Water. Solve and maintain the balance of the elements in an environment that adapts to your own energy. Relaxing and explosive!

name: My Girlfriend's Special Place
description: One day, our hero is headed home from Akihabara when he's mistaken for a molester. The person accusing him is his childhood friend, Fuyuka Akiyoshi. "If you want me to forgive you, then become my butler!" Recently reunited, these two end up in an unusual relationship as their story begins...

name: Ovivim
description: Ovivim is a virtual pet for streamers that lives on Twitch streams by its own free will. These little creatures come in many different forms, and how they grow depends on how you care for them.

name: Hexagonal Explods
description: Hexagonal Explods is a vertical shoot 'em up game where you need to defend the earth from aliens. Collect power ups, fight funny bosses and... well... SHOOT THEM UP!

name: Helmetman
description: Enjoy a rouge-like deckbuilding card game and story at once! Helmetman, who was just an ordinary delivery guy, became a hero out of vengeance. He is shockingly ugly, but don't worry, since he always has his helmet on! You may be able to start a relationship... but... that probably won't happen...

name: Escape Dream
description: Help the character trapped in a dream to escape and go to work next day!

name: Unluckily in Love
description: A wholesome BL VN about a young man, Yuel, struggling to come to terms with his father’s death. Seeking solace, he turns to his older cousin, Tavi, for help, and their relationship takes a surprising turn as Yuel begins to develop feelings for Tavi that are more than just familial.

name: Mile High Taxi
description: Deliver Zany Passengers While Dodging Mile-High Skyscrapers & Blabbermouth Pedestrians.

name: WuJiDaoRen
description: WuJiDaoRen is a physics-based fighting game, that can put you back into the classic Kung Fu films. Play as a mighty hero to challenge the most dangerous villains in the world and bring peace to the people.

name: Absinthia
description: Absinthia is a turn-based RPG that explores themes of love, loss, betrayal and acceptance as four close friends fight to protect their home.

name: Last Nuclear Darkness
description: Nuclear Reactor Simulator, operable by a single person with the help of an AI Assistant, stalked by Bel'Uk, the third demon that invaded our world, and all the dead who support him. You must survive and keep the reactor running to light up the city.

name: Life of Delta
description: Embark on a journey through a vast post-apocalyptic environment, full of interesting characters and engaging puzzle games in this sci-fi point-and-click adventure game.

name: Rough Justice: '84
description: Do what it takes to make your fledgling security agency thrive in this 80s noir crime bustin', dirty crossing, vengeance-seeking board game inspired strategy game with dice and cards. Advise your team on the best course of action, through strategy, calculated decisions, and a bit of luck.

name: FlyWings 2018 Flight Simulator
description: FlyWings 2018 - Flight Simulator is the masterpiece of flight simulation!Fasten your seatbelts and be ready for the most realistic and beautiful flight of your life!80 AIRCRAFTS to choose, REAL airlines and liveries, REAL audios, AMAZING environment, REALISTIC physics for best simulation.

name: Barotrauma
description:
Barotrauma is a 2D online multiplayer game taking place in a submarine travelling through the icy depths of Jupiter’s moon Europa. The bone-crushing pressure outside the submarine, the strange creatures inhabiting the ocean and the potentially dangerous equipment and machines on board ensure that the tiniest slip can turn the game into a chaotic struggle for survival.

The game is heavily inspired by Space Station 13 and a game concept called Pressure.

name: Frog Soup
description: A hack full of short levels and silly ideas.

name: A Lucky First Turnabout: A Klavier Gavin Story
description: In an alternate universe where Klavier Gavin is the rookie defense attorney and Apollo Justice is the genius prosecutor...

name: I'm a Grown Up!! Dreamy Sweetie The Devil Slayer
description: Sin descripción

name: Left Turn Legend
description: Think you're the best at turning left? Compete in the asphalt and dirt races, or go rogue and drive the wrong way around the track!

name: Cracky
description:
The game is cleared when all the stars are taken.

The cracked floor disappears when you pass over it, so you can only pass through it once.

name: Space Invaders by Copper France
description:
This is Space Invaders for the Amstrad CPC!
Keyboard left and right arrows are used to move the laser and SPACE to fire.
The goal is to defeat wave after wave of descending aliens to earn as many points as possible.

name: DawnCraft
description: DawnCraft is an RPG Adventure Modpack for Minecraft created by bstylia14. The modpack uses almost 300 mods to make an amazing new fantasy world for you to explore.

name: CPCMiniPac
description:
Developed as part of the 2023 BASIC 10-Liner contest. CPCMiniPac is a game based on Pac-Man. The aim is to eat all the points without getting caught by a ghost. The game is controlled with the arrow keys.

There are 2 big dots that cannot be eaten.

However, the ghosts can pass these points. So be careful!

name: Samsara
description: Enter a world thrown out of balance. Nature has separated into its three physical states with no hope of returning to harmony. It's up to you to restore the balance. Use your abilities over solid, liquid, and gas to traverse levels and solve puzzles in this 2D platformer.

name: Coloring Pixels: Stained Glass Pack
description: This Stained Glass-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Images designed in the abstract mosaic style art that makes up Stained Glass!

name: Magic Vigilante
description: A bullet hell shooter where you can manipulate time to deflect enemy projectiles.

name: Quiz Thiz Austria: Gold Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Pack - Variety Pack 6
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Chibi
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Forbidden City Journey
description: This is a VR tour game based on the real picture, which can not only allows players to immerse themselves in the majesty of the Forbidden City, but also to understand the culture and history of the Forbidden City through a mini-game.

name: Lana and the Milking Table
description: You’ve won a free all day massage! You head to the parlor to find out if it’s legit or not and you meet your beautiful masseuse Lana. You’re about to get the most memorable massage of your life!​

name: Idol Hands 2
description: You, who have a discerning eye, found two luminous rough stones . One is Song Yunzhen, a beauty, In addition to the super high value of classical beauty, she is also a creative talent. The other is the exact opposite, a hot Taiwanese girl Rainie with dyed blond hair and trendy clothes.

name: Gharp
description: Pranga is a stealth-focused first person shooter game about sneaking into a terrorist organisation to prevent an attack.

name: Pasajeros
description: Pasajeros is developed through a collection of urban and surreal stories collected in a taxi in Bogotá . It’s a four-night adventure packed with micro-stories of vampires, mariachis, and thugs. In addition to the opportunity to find love or madness in the night magic of a city.

name: Memory Lane
description:
This game is a story-based textadventure where you can explore the town and discover mysterious places. Collect multiple items and interact with other citizens. There's just one hook... they no longer seem to remember you.

You can reach up to 6 different endings depending on your actions!

name: Lin Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Slime: Black Hole Game
description: Super Slime is a black hole game that can swallow everything near you! Your mouth is a black hole that swallows everything smaller than you. To eat larger things, move around smoothly like a snake and devour more and more.

name: Adventures of Polo
description: Adventures of Polo is a puzzle adventure game for the Playdate handheld console. It is inspired by Lolo for the NES and other similar games.

name: A Trans Man's Grindr DMs
description:
From the creator: "This is a curation of Grindr messages I've received. Each of these hold personal significance to me, and I hope that you enjoy reading them as much as I did."

CW: sexual references

name: CrossGunr: Infinite
description: CrossGunr: Infinite is a caravan shooter, and sequel to CrossGunr, developed for PICO-8.

name: And These Iron Limbs Exiled From Heaven
description: Turn based dungeon crawling with ring-based combat -- interrupted by hot visual novel action. Cursed lesbian mecha-angel roguelike.

name: Defender X
description: A short, caravan shmup. Reach for higher scores, unlock new pallets, unveil the eye!

name: Exophilie
description:
Heavy scrap metal harsh noise and exploratory, sensory-degrading video game- Exophilie is a training tool to prepare cognitive adaptation in the azathothcene and speculative effects of libidinal anticosmic frequencies on human boundaries.

Interactive visualizer of the album Exophilie by Un Regard Froid. Each track is represented by an explorable space decaying and breaking apart in sync with the noise frequencies.

name: Berry Brother
description: A metroidvania with a unique perspective mechanic. Find your missing clothes and confront your tiny brother...

name: Fantasy Journey
description:
​Set out on an epic journey in this spectacular 2D anime RPG—welcome to Fantasy Journey: Survival ARPG!

This cute yet feisty action RPG will take you straight to the fantasy world engulfed in chaos and swarming with enemies. But fear not: you’ll sure handle challenges like a boss!

name: The Closing Walls
description: Jump from one wall to the other and collect balls to move the walls back so you do not get crushed.

name: Slider X
description: A four way block matching puzzle game for the Playdate

name: Failure Drill
description: A 2D, singleplayer adventure game set in the near future. The player controls Claire on her journey as a soldier in a mysterious war, while also attempting to solve the enigmas her identity and reality hinged upon before. This game is a drama with psychological horror themes and stylized 2D art.

name: The Little Witch Shop: New in Town
description: In this shop management game, acquire new familiars to help cultivate your greenhouse, hunt fantastical creatures, and craft potions or runes to fulfill customer orders. Earn gold to upgrade your magic shop and impress the Witches’ Council.

name: Poly Jigsaw: Birds
description: Poly Jigsaw: Birds is a traditional style jigsaw puzzle game, with a cute birdies.

name: Virtual Near Death Experience
description: We want to create experiences in VR that are impossible in the ordinary world You take off into another dimension, otherworldly beautiful sounds, float without a body. This is our artistic interpretation of hundreds of readings about near-death experiences. A first person experience.

name: Super Block Crush
description: Super block crash is a new Breakout game, with a sprinkle of RPG.

name: Belial Red
description: After her kingdom is conquered by a neighboring country, Sheryl decides to join their army in a bid to find an opportunity to win her freedom.

name: Traveler's Bastion
description: A bullet heaven and tower defense mashup. Guard your traveling castle from an imperial army trying to hunt you down. Combine elemental bending styles and theory-craft the perfect set of game-breaking ability chains.

name: Iron Mandate
description: Master the piloting of giant mechanical worms, lay waste to all that stand in your way and reclaim your rightful place on the throne.

name: Robolife2: Nova Duty
description: 2nd series from Robolife-Days with Aino Live with a robot girl from nowhere. Fix her body and find her secret. Visual Novel with Date sim & time management gameplay!

name: Bowerwhelm
description: Bowerwhelm is an FPS Rogue-like game with minimalist graphics. Kill until you die, upgrade the skills, make powerful builds, and kill more!

name: Here to Stay
description: Join the race for power in the new political strategy game. Build a strong political party, win the regional elections and have a majority in parliament. As the head of state, you are in charge of running the state, managing the state budget and diplomacy.

name: DCS World: Mosquito FB VI - V for Victory Campaign by Reflected Simulations
description: Some of the thrilling sorties flown by Mosquito units in World War II belong to movie screens rather than history books. The ’wooden wonder’ flew in an astonishing variety of roles, and some of them were truly stranger than fiction. ’V for Victory’ will take you through most of these different sorties: Night intruder, ranger, oboe pathfinder, noball, photo recce, Joan Eleanor - just to mention a few.

name: DCS World: AV-8B Kerman Campaign by Ground Pounder Sims
description: Join ‘Detachment B’ of US Marine Corps Harrier squadron VMA-311 as they embark on ‘The Kerman Campaign’. The 2011 Arab Spring has driven civil unrest across the middle east and in Iran has resulted in the violent repression of it’s citizens, this chain of events has led to the formation of a US led coalition and the launch of Operation Persian Freedom. The Kerman Campaign puts you in the shoes of USMC Captain Mitch ‘Mike-Mike’ Mickleson as the Harrier pilots of ‘Det B’ fight to protect their fellow marines on the ground.

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Inherent Resolve Campaign by Looking Glass
description: Welcome to Inherent Resolve - an exciting and immersive player friendly campaign for the F/A-18C Hornet in Syria.

name: Before Your Eyes
description: Embark on an emotional award-winning adventure where you control the story—and affect its outcomes—with your real-life blinks. In this unique VR experience, you will fully immerse yourself in a world of memories, both joyous and heartbreaking, as your whole life flashes before your eyes.

name: Magpie
description: You are a curious magpie who loves to collect shiny trinkets.

name: Re: Dream
description: In dreams, there are people you often meet, towns you often visit, and places you often die. Wake up in the morning and repeat.

name: Blythe
description:
A RPG Maker exploration/adventure game about a girl doing her homework, and a small world at its tail end.

Become the backbone of a new society ruled by man's mind and heart.

name: Zombie World
description: Zombie World is a free placement strategy game. You will lead your hero team to search for materials, explore secret places, fight against foreign enemies and build your own hero base in the dangerous end times.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Liyue & Inazuma Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Inazuma and Liyue civilizations from Genshin impact with their respective leaders, Kamisato Ayaka and Keqing. Features:

- Unique districts (Triarchal Council & Liyue Harbor)
- Unique building (Yashiro Commission)
- Unique units (Shogunate Ashigaru & Millelith)
- Features music from Genshin Impact
- And much more!

name: Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe: Ultimate Edition
description: Enter a fantastic world full of magic and charm. Rebuild legendary tales with Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe. A new puzzle game experience awaits.

name: Dr Smart Space Encyclopedia
description: Set out on an epic adventure through the Solar System. A journey of a lifetime alongside Dr Smart, and his reliable Cosmic Encyclopedia.

name: Ultimate Anime Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Kawaii girls are broken into pieces. Can you reunite them by completing these jigsaw puzzles?

name: Pokémon Mundo Misterioso: Relatos de una Phione
description: Fangame based on the "Pokémon Mystery Dungeon" series of video games, lasting approximately three hours and exploring the story of the legendary Pokémon Manaphy.

name: Quiz Thiz Austria: Silver Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Traveler's Bastion: Spirit Guardians Expansion
description: Support the development of Traveler's Bastion and Unlock 4 New Travelers each with 3 special auto attacks.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season 2: Mega
description: Become Mega in Fortnite Battle Royale: Chapter 4 Season 2! Ride the grind rails of Mega City and swerve on it's streets on a sports bike. Go beyond the neon towers to the rest of the new biome: Cause havoc at Steamy Springs, drive a Nitro Drifter to the Drift Ridge car track, sharpen your Kinetic Blade skills at Kenjutsu Crossing and more!

name: Living Legends Remastered: Wrath of the Beast - Collector's Edition
description: Can you take on Goldilocks' mantel and protect the kingdom?

name: Mato Anomalies: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Mato Anomalies Digital Deluxe Edition includes:

Base Game
Pioneer's Badge
Treasure from Heaven (Mind Hack Card)
Early Spring (Mind Hack Card)
Witness of Truth
Special Weapon's Pack
Special Gears Pack
Soundtrack Jukebox
Digital Art Book

name: Dr. Smart Space Adventure: In the Space
description: Set out on an epic adventure through the Solar System. A journey of a lifetime alongside Dr Smart, and his reliable Cosmic Encyclopedia.

name: Pixel Family Fun: Ultimate Edition
description: Have fun and relax in Pixel Family Fun. Choose from a wide range of drawings and expand your pixel art gallery!

name: Sherlock Purr
description: Join Sherlock Purr on a purrfect adventure!

name: Paw Patrol: Grand Prix - Pup Treat Arena
description:
It’s party time at the Paw Patrol Grand Prix, and you and up to three pup pals are invited! Rev up for Pawsome fun as you compete to collect the most pup treats, before the time runs out. And use amazing Paw Patrol power-ups to gain pup treats and take the lead!
Use any skill, like Everest’s Snowballs, Tracker's Grabber Arm, and Ryder's Invincibility Shield, to outdo other players.

name: Coloring Pixels: Japan Pack
description: This Japan-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! All images are of Japanese icons or Japanese culture!

name: Neon Blast
description: Neon Blast is a head-scratching puzzle game.

name: Dinobot and Tiara Present: ApplePop
description: Apple Pop is a super relaxing, super satisfying Puzzle Popper with powerups, beautiful scenery and major combo's for literally anyone to play to pass the time or to let off some stress.

name: Extreme Tag!
description: Extreme Tag! is a casual party game for all! Run from tagged players to stay alive. Last one standing wins!

name: Silent Nights
description: Silent Nights - A short horror game with realistic graphics, touching storyline and scary moments.

name: Pino the Elemental
description: Adventure game in hack slash style, with different spells and pets, enemies with different difficulties, high difficulty level against bosses.

description: A short action game that the girl go "There" with a dragon.

name: BRoS: Battle Royale of Survival
description: Fight against other survivors and watch the time to escape from the island. Jump into the battle royale experience and try to survive. To increase your chance of survival, arm yourself and show no mercy. Chaos reigns on the island and only one survives or no one. Be a survivor!

description: Cx6 is an arcade-style bullet hell game about deflecting off walls and manipulating gravity to avoid being struck by an endless wave of bullets.

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Extended Edition
description: In this game you will shoot, you will fight, and you will win! Play S.N.I.P.E.R., the latest sniping game where you aim, fight and destroy virtual enemies. Try different types of missions, inspired both by classic rail shooters and modern cover shooters. Fight your way out during day and night, destroy evil forces and unlock new weapons and power-ups.

name: Food Truck Tycoon: Multiplayer Edition
description: Jump into your food truck and business will bump up! Test your skills and talent as owner of a busy food truck! Your only job is to take orders, prepare food and serve to as many customers as possible. Be careful not to burn the food! Fulfill your dream of becoming the tycoon of the best food trucks in the city!

This DLC includes 5 outfits for Noby and Friends, 8 types of furniture and 1 mini-story.

name: EvilUp

Offering challenging quests, various equipment, numerous types of enemies and random generation of levels will make your every attempt unique.

name: Helpless
description: In the heat of deserted lands, a child and their mother weakened by sickness try to survive a harsh world. Through a kid’s perspective, take action and explore the remains of a lost past. Protect yourself from the sun’s immense intensity and help your family get back on the road.

name: You Are Sick
description: Do you like feeling sick? Well, this is the perfect game for you! Feel the thrill of testing your parkour skills as you overcome simulated sickness. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Etherion Online
description: Gear up! Become a prestige master in weapons or master a skill - join thousands of other players in this massive 2D adventure!

name: Doomsday Survivors
description: Doomsday Survivors is a doomsday survival rogue bullet hell shooting game. You can choose a variety of characters and choose different weapon combinations to pass the level. Super fast-paced game style, every game can bring you a different experience!

name: Felix the Toy DX
description: The complete Felix The Toy experience is now on Nintendo Switch! Explore a world from the perspective of a small toy. At exactly 6:12 p.m the human race vanishes into thin air.

name: Alignment
description: A challenging and engaging puzzle game that will require you to move colored objects and place them on their respective platforms to explore through a series of increasingly complex levels.

name: Bedrock High
description: A beat 'em up RPG adventure! Fight for your pride, meet interesting characters and solve the mysteries of Bedrock High!

name: ITRP: Aero Star
description: Dynamic, unpredictable and hardcore runner. Try to overcome a long and very varied track with a lot of unique challenges. Can you reach the finish line?

name: Paper Flight: Beyond Time
description: Paper Flight: Beyond Time is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. You jump into the role of a little paper plane that is supposed to rescue the world from little but evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

description: Welcome to the world ruled over by the demons, where mankind edges on the brink of extinction. Men have paid the price in blood, leaving only the young and the elderly behind. It is up to the women to finally pick up their arms and fight for the sake of those who remains..!

name: Ragnarok Survivors: Valhalla

name: Vlobs
description: A relaxing casual puzzle game all about placing, connecting and popping vlobs.

name: Mythology Waifus Mahjong
description: Will you be able to defeat all the strong girls? Fight against beautiful mythological warriors in this mythological-themed mix of classic mahjong and combat.

name: Time Wasters
description: Time Wasters is a space shooter bullet heaven roguelite. Equip and upgrade weapons, destroy swarms of enemies, and collect Time & Space Cubes to bend the timeline to your advantage.

name: Torevetchi
description: The Torevetchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano, released in March 2023, based on the anime and manga series Tokyo Revengers by Ken Wakui.

name: Kinda Knirpsi
description: Take on the role of Knirpsi the turtle and face a variety of enemies. Experience retro cartoon-style shooter action and hand-drawn boss battles. You will die. Many Times.

name: DC's Justice League: Cosmic Chaos
description: Suit up as Batman, Wonder Woman and Superman and take on some of the most powerful Super-Villains in the DC universe with DC’s Justice League: Cosmic Chaos.

name: Beholgar: Collector's Edition
description:
An evil sorcerer reads the ancient book and invites an evil god to earth. It is necessary to eliminate this evil threat. And the fate of the earth is in the hands of a barbarian.

Beholgar is a classically styled 2D Metroidvania adventure. Explore caverns, ancient woods, and deadly castles; battle creatures and solve ancient mysteries in the kingdom.

name: Tales of the Neon Sea: Collector's Edition
description: Welcome to a world of intrigue and suspicion. Where humans and robots contend with escalating tensions and mutual distrust. And where gangster felines scheme their way to the top of the food chain. Welcome to the Tales of the Neon Sea!

name: Undead World
description: The world war is near its end, and the enemy are weakened, is your time to get a victory. A fast-paced combat shooter with survival gameplay.

name: Frogurai
description: Welcome to Japan in the feudal age, in the midst of samurais, your role as a frog is to cut all the snakurais to save the frogurai kingdom and end the war between frogs and snakes.

name: Rina RhythmError
description: The indie rhythm game Rina RhythmError is now here, lighting up the retro electronic trend! Bring a unique BOSS Fight experience with the "ERROR Girls"!

name: Project: Nightlight
description: Project: Nighlight is a VR survival horror game with a focus on immersive atmospheres. To survive the night you will need to solve puzzles and face the unseen horrors in the dark by using your wits and what little resources you can find. Will you be able to bring back order, or succumb to the chaos?

name: Boulette Hell
description: Defeat bosses in this bullet hell with unique characters and silly stories. Will you be able to escape the clutches of a contract you signed for the purchase of a yogurt maker?

name: Handyman Legend
description: The dude was a playboy when he was young, while after losing his job in big company, he become a handyman who take cases from smartphone app. Even though the money is short, but he somehow discovers a new paradise...

name: Mato Anomalies
description:
Mato Anomalies is a turn-based RPG that takes players on a journey across Mato, a fantasized neo-futuristic version of a bygone oriental city. Take control of the Dual Protagonists Doe and Gram to investigate strange anomalies around the city, or venture into rifts to battle demonic abominations determined to bring about the city's downfall.

Team up with unlikely companions and unravel the dark secrets in this story of Duty, Hope and Justice.

name: Mr. Prepper: Animal Farm
description: Take care of the animals, repair the farm’s facilities, learn fishing, explore the new areas, adopt a dog, get to the bottom of the Agency’s special interest in the farm and discover the mystery lurking from above! Use what you learn on the farm in your shelter and breed your own animals!

name: SourceWorlds
description: SourceWorlds is a third-person action-adventure that throws you into the strange world of 'the Architect'. Solve quests, loot items and have a great time trying to escape this CCC state-of-the-art indie game from the future.

name: Big Ambitions
description: Big Ambitions is a revolutionary role-playing business sim. Go from nothing to the biggest entrepreneur in New York by opening small businesses or slowly building huge corporations any way you like.

name: The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker
description: Immerse yourself in a medieval fantasy world in this classic top-down single player adventure RPG. Journey through a sprawling open world and progress through dialogue options to uncover the story of Rothar Aercrest - the cursed lord to the remote lands of Imberthale.

name: Sun Haven
description: Sun Haven is a multiplayer fantasy farming sim with dragons, magic, a main questline, RPG-style skill progression, and even a final boss. Farm, fish, fight, mine, smith, cook, and craft in this cozy farming RPG!

name: Bleak Faith: Forsaken
description:
A third-person open world survival horror action RPG set in a universe you've never experienced before. Play as one of the Forsaken, the last frontier of humanity against the growing horrors of the Omnistructure. As you find yourself stranded in a faraway outpost, you must adapt in order to survive. The world won't wait for you though, you must venture into the unknown - your faith will decide your fate.

Feel the burden of surviving in one of the last remaining outposts of the Forsaken, a legion of hunters condemned to protect the last vestige of humanity. The nature of your purpose however is shrouded in mystery, and as you delve deeper into the manifold halls of the Omnistructure, you will come to find the true meaning of alienation, isolation, and dread. A cross between cyberpunk, and dark fantasy - Bleak Faith will offer a story and experience that will be a breath of fresh air for all gamers looking for a something new. The world is full of lore, and every aspect of it is crafted with utmost passion and a dedication to art. As a baseline there is an estimated 30+ hours of content, a deep class system, and a procedural AI system that ensures that no playthrough is ever the same.

The architecture of the world, the Omnistructure, is a huge aspect of the game. Meticulously designed and crafted, Bleak Faith aims to provide an emergent narrative method coupled with more structured traditional moments. The world of Bleak Faith is labyrinthine, tapping into an innate curious instinct we all have when faced with many defined branching choices - we focus on creating a strong sense of curiosity about the path not taken, by offering unique and compelling content in every area of the world - having said that the world employs both vast open areas, and more linear openness in Metroidvania fashion. The aim is to evoke that same feeling of wonder and excitement that you felt the first time you played a game, the first time you experienced 3D graphics, the first time you experienced something that felt formative and not habitual. Open world in Bleak Faith is a crucial aspect to showing you the reality of the Forsaken. In this world there are few havens for the Forsaken, and these are generally outposts which serve as bases (of various complexities and utility) to recover from journeys and prepare for more - however, nowhere is truly safe!

Expect tight and meticulously crafted and expanded combat that brings tempo and action to this world in amazing quality and detail. We're not shying away from a challenge, and so we're going all in. Despite being a small team, we couldn't accept a simple mundane combat system; we are making it fleshed out, and very robust. The combat communicates the danger in adrenaline-pumping fashion. Fast, responsive, and unforgiving - you will earn and feel every victory, nothing comes easy. Approach combat in your own way however - choose stealth over face-to-face combat, choose ranged over melee, choose Technomancy over more traditional combat styles. The system allows you to express yourself through combat, or through avoiding it - and that's further supported through a class system as well.

How better to experience the unyielding uncertainty of the Omnistructure than through a simulated ecosystem of factions and AI groups. Inhabitants of the Omnistructure will compete among themselves, grow and expand, change and adapt - the food chain in the ecosystem will, as a result, mold to every playthrough (e.g. an apex predator from your last playthrough might have already died out in this playthrough and you never fight it again). It's a constant race against time as enemies will try and outgrow and outsmart not only you, but other competition. Hunt, scavenge, and grow to stay on top of the food chain. Never experience an area the same way as the procedural nature of the ecosystem will ensure that you can never let your guard down. Having said that, there are still linear areas of the game, especially those that cover main plot points - to ensure a direction and purpose for the player. The ecosystem makes every moment of gameplay interesting and engaging - even on multiple playthroughs.

Fight against the odds, and stay alive despite the Omnistructure's evergrowing threat. Craft, scavenge, hunt, and find ways to excel. Pick a class, upgrade stats, augment your character, create equipment and stay healthy. Resist the Puppet Plague, and the many afflictions present in the world which can change the outcome of your journey entirely. Use stealth and your environment to your advantage - fighting is not always the best course of action, and when it is, preparing the field to shift the odds in your favor is a necessary tactic.

name: There Will Be Ink
description: There Will Be Ink is a tactical action game for 1-4 players. Play solo or with friends in battles between stick figure armies on a paper notepad, just like you used to draw in class instead of paying attention!

name: The Heist in LS
description:
"The Heist in LS" is a fun and quirky puzzle exploration game that continues the story of our protagonist from Loading Studios previous game, "Waking Up in LS". This time, she's tasked by two journalists with a new mission: to break into Cristiano Ronaldo's mansion and steal the secret recipe for his famous Travesseiros cakes.

As you explore the mansion, you'll encounter various obstacles and challenges that will test your puzzle-solving skills. You'll need to use your wit and cunning to outsmart Ronaldo's security measures and collect helpful items along the way.

But it's not all serious business! "The Heist in LS" is full of hilarious moments and tongue-in-cheek references that are sure to make you laugh out loud. From hidden Easter eggs to unexpected plot twists, this game is packed with surprises and delights at every turn.

Whether you're a fan of puzzle games, exploration games, or just love a good laugh, this is the perfect game for you. With its engaging gameplay, charming pixel art graphics, and irreverent sense of humor, this game is sure to leave you smiling and wanting more.

So what are you waiting for? Put on your best heist outfit, grab your bag of tricks, and get ready for the adventure of a lifetime in "The Heist in LS"!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Delicious Foods
description: Jigsaw Puzzle: Delicious Foods is a puzzle game that challenges your puzzle-solving skills with mouth-watering images of dishes from around the world. With over 50 beautiful images and 5 difficulty levels, this game is a visual feast for foodies and puzzle enthusiasts.

name: Angmngthoo
description: a single map with brutalist style architecture

name: Beyond Beco World
description: Sin descripción

name: Valiant Rooster
description: Valiant Rooster is a JRPG wich follows the journey of a rooster, Gianni Matragrano, search of his father, going through different dangers and obstacles and discovering horizons that he had not dared to explore before.

name: Lost and Damned
description:
Resident Evil-inspired modification, featuring basic mechanics from classic RE games, such as static camera, inventory, tank controls and more...

Players find themselves in a mysterious mansion, full of zombies, headcrabs and other dangers. With limited inventory and movement, escaping the residence of evil horrors will not be an easy task.

name: Surrealidade: Dadaist Remix
description: Surrealidade: Dadaist Remix is an update for Surrealidade: Definitive Edition, which adds brand-new content after 20 years, with a Dadaist New Game+ that unlocks an unprecedented game mode created after 20 years, a retro mini-game, a short film, new extra content, and a huge amount of content made available as additional material.

name: Drug Prince & Narcotic Girl for Nintendo Switch
description:
A Nintendo Switch version of Drug Prince and Narcotic Girl that includes the Main Story, from the first encounter with the main characters all the way up to the fake marriage chapter.

In addition to the newly written story from the boyfriend’s point of view, the Switch version also includes a new opening movie, newly drawn illustrations, and a new sensitivity feature. Also, the Side Story, which is available as an additional purchase, includes a “newlywed” themed story that was previously only available in the fan book.

name: Tower Brawl
description: Tower Brawl is a casual and competitive game that combines elements of tower defense, real-time strategy and card genres.Instead of the usual tower defense games, Tower Brawl features an original siege theme and a variety of personality-filled heroes with synergies and counters between their abilities and classes. Featured an original siege theme and tons of colorful heroes which belong to different classes, crushing enemies through synergy. Tower Brawl promotes an environment full of variables with random card draws in the battle to keep you and your opponent on your toes! In this exciting game, players will enjoy a powerful balance between strategy and randomness.

name: Drill Deal: Oil Tycoon
description: Drill Deal is a fun oil business simulator. Start from a single tiny rig and expand it to a large complex of connected platforms. Optimize & grow your business. Look out for threats like weather, terrorists, fire, and others. Take care of your working crews.

name: Yenemy
description: Yenemy is a new free browser multiplayer top-down view PvP hardcore survival IO game. The game features exploring, gathering resources, crafting, building a shelter and protecting fellow clanmates from other players.

name: Trip To Nonogram: Bali Ubud
description:
A trip to Ubud to get away from the repetitive routine like a treadmill.
When you solve the nonogram puzzle, a unique and beautiful scenery that can only be seen on your travels unfolds.

Enjoy the pleasure of exotic travel destinations now!

name: Fear or Evil: Nightmare Horror Scary Game Phobia 2023 Simulator Hunter Games
description: Fear or Evil is a first-person mystery game, mixed with different mechanics that will make you discover the scary story of the main character.

name: Showtime: Vampire Diaries
description: Are you a good interviewer? You have the most intriguing guest ever, a vampire, but be careful with the question! He's a pretty irascible guest.

name: Tiny Troopers: Global Ops - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Attention! Tiny Troopers: Global Ops is a fast-paced arcade twin-stick shooter in which you lead an elite squad of Tiny Troopers on action-packed missions to take down hordes of unscrupulous enemies from all corners of the world!

name: Transport Fever 2: Console Edition - Deluxe Edition
description: The classic transport simulation genre has a new gold standard with Transport Fever 2. Provide the world with the transport infrastructure it needs and make a fortune with custom-made transport services. Discover a whole new world by navigating transport routes through land, water and air. May progress and prosperity find their way!

description: Space Tail is a 2.5D adventure platformer, which immerses the player in a deep, emotional plot, and lets him explore new planets and interact with alien civilizations.

name: Doraemon Story of Seasons: Friends of the Great Kingdom - Together with Animals
description: Bring home an animal themed pack with a stable full of outfits, furniture, and a mini-story.

name: Escort Alia: Escort Rena
description: A short FPS game. The game is a free add-on for the base game.

name: Puzzle Together: Great Paintings Jigsaw Super Pack
description: Unlock 508 puzzles depicting great paintings! Relax making these puzzles on your own or with friends and family. In addition to unlocking 508 unique puzzles (a $76.94 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

name: Puzzle Together: Architecture Jigsaw Super Pack
description: Unlock 185 puzzles depicting buildings and landmarks! Relax making these puzzles on your own or with friends and family. In addition to unlocking 185 unique puzzles (a $32.97 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

name: Puzzle Together: Animals Jigsaw Super Pack
description: Unlock 277 puzzles depicting wild, lovable, and crazy animals! Relax making these puzzles on your own or with friends. In addition to unlocking 277 unique puzzles (a $34.97 value if purchased in-game), this Super Pack also comes with 5 puzzle credits so you can unlock some more of your choosing.

description: It's a beautiful day in Upside Town—which means putting through the most topsy turvy mini golf course the world has never known! A physics-defying system of gravity fields permeates the neighborhood, so do your stretches and take an umbrella because you just never know which way things will roll.

name: R-Gear
description:
A cancelled follow-up to Taito's 1994 shooting game Rayforce that was shelved in favour of development of Raystorm - a single stage prototype for the game was made but was formerly unreleased bar for some screenshots and videoclips.

As part of the Ray'z Arcade Chronology the prototype build consisting of a single stage was released as a bonus standalone game, featuring new music from series composer Tamayo Kawamoto.

name: Arcade Archives: Turbo Force
description: A frantic aerial battle against the fastest, strongest enemies yet!

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S: Masyu
description: Nikoli's original puzzle using only black and white circles for hints.

name: Sukebe Beach
description: Break all the blocks and collect the images.

name: Hentai Puzzles: The Origin
description: Meet Melissa and Amanda in this casual Hentai puzzle game.

name: Ghosts from the House of Flesh
description: Ghosts from the House of Flesh is a horror puzzle game made in 2D pixel art. In the game, you have to collect hidden totems in the forest with ghosts of all kinds.

name: Galactic Empire
description: Galactic Empire is a 2D turn-based strategy game where you, as the Commander, decide the fate of the entire universe. Expand your planet, explore solar systems, play cards in cantinas, modify your ships and conquer more planets.

name: Escaping a Fireworks Factory: Nyanzou & Kumakichi - Escape Game
description: Let's escape to become a fireworks craftsman.

name: A Passive Boy at the Huntress Clinic
description: Sin descripción

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Thailand and Cambodia
description: Immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage and breathtaking landscapes of Thailand and Cambodia.

description: Geko: entering the pipe is a casual, fast-paced game where you play Geko, an unlucky lizard who ends up in two plumbing pipes while trying to catch a fly. Help Geko dodge all the enemies and obstacles and escape the pipes, so he can finally get back to his hunt.

name: Battle Cry of Freedom: Blood & Gore
description: Experience the brutal and gruesome reality of the 19th Century with the Blood & Gore DLC for Battle Cry of Freedom. With the Blood & Gore DLC you can expect to see new and improved death and wounded animations including decapitations, dismemberment and more.

name: The Good Life: Behind the Secret of Rainy Woods
description:
Elizabeth is alive, and no one remembers what happened in the Goddamn Hellhole, that is Rainy Woods. It's time to find out what’s really going on… And maybe enjoy some time in the countryside along the way.

Take on a slew of new side quests from the residents of Rainy Woods and come across some new faces along the way. Help them learn photography! Cook together! Set up secret dates! Save someone’s life...?

Well it’s time for Naomi to put that drink aside and put on her journalism hat once again!

This DLC includes 12 new side quests, with many secrets left to uncover…
Let's peek a bit further behind the curtain of Rainy Woods shall we?

name: Blue Wednesday: Prologue
description: An experience filled with stories and music See the world through the eyes of jazz pianist, Morris. takes you through a dream-like adventure through jazz and love, and failure.

description: The principle is simple, the more time you spend, the richer you will be, you can do nothing and get money, but the decisions you make will allow you to get even more!

name: Plink Game
description: Game with Plink where you need to beat the game and collect as many as you can coins!

name: Darker Tides
description: A beast of unmeasurable power is rising from the depths of the sea, it seeks to engulf the world with it's dark tentacles, it's up to Aala to stop the Kraken.

name: Highscore
description: Highscore is a 2D platform jumper with rogue-lite elements where players collect items to boost their attributes, score higher combos and reach more points. Unlock new features and customize your character as you level up. Compete with other players on the online leaderboard in singleplayer mode.

"Fatal Frame: Mask of the Lunar Eclipse” (full game)

"Fatal Frame: Mask of the Lunar Eclipse" Digital Artbook

Rogetsu Isle Dinner Party Costume Set

-Misaki Exclusive Costume "Nightwear (Pink)"
-Choshiro Exclusive Costume "Rash Guard & Surf Shorts"
-Ruka Exclusive Accessory "Cat Ears (White)"
-Misaki Exclusive Accessory "Cat Ears (Black)"

-Misaki Exclusive Accessory "Organ Mask (Rogetsu Kagura - Bell)"
-Madoka Exclusive Accessory "Organ Mask (Rogetsu Kagura - Strings)"

name: Dungeon Furry
description: Explore Dungeons, with enemies and puzzles, and horny girls. After the best rewards you can get for saving furry girls.

name: Death Angel Nightmare
description: Death Angel Nightmare is a traditional RM horror character adventure game with single story and multiple death achievements. The story length is less than 2 hours.Matsushita and Taojing are a loving couple, but they are caught in the chase. Why is this?
