description: A Party MMO with real-world impact. Hang out with your friends, decorate your apartment and play dozens of action-packed multiplayer games. Team up with a sponsor and unlock impact items to be hatched into real world impact such as trees and carbon removed from the atmosphere.

name: Lost Oliver
description: Lost Oliver is a puzzle game heavily inspired by Pokémon. Control little Oliver's mother and use her special abilities to clear the way and rescue her lost baby.

name: Australian Football Coach 2023
description: Coach your way to the premiership flag! Australian Football Coach 2023 comes packed with new features including local multiplayer and a database update.

name: Oli One: Sneak in
description: Trick the neighbors and take their diamonds!

name: Caverns of Mars: Recharged
description: Race through caverns while blasting away enemies and terrain to reach the depths of Mars in this reimagining of the 1981 classic.

name: Pipe Dreams
description: This one goes out to the lovers, the believers and the pipe dreamers. All we want is a place that we can be free and live up to our full potential; be something better than ourselves. ‘Pipe Dreams’ is the game where you can power up to the rank of believer and reminisce in the past that never was. Perform space flips in the imagined world of self belief, hang around for a second in the Joy Shop of life, in times that never were. It’s the way of life in a made up fantasy, that we all wanted, but never got.

name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe: Booster Course Pass - Wave 4
description: In Wave 4 of the Mario Kart 8 Deluxe: Booster Course, you will get joined by Birdo as a racer! The pass will also contain 8 tracks, with Yoshi's Island being one of them.

name: Session: Skate Sim - Brandalised Pack
description: The pack contains: 4 T-shirts, 4 sweatshirts and 8 exclusive skateboards, all in Brandalised colours.

name: Cannon Dancer: Osman
description: Cannon Dancer (also known as Osman) is an action jump & run adventure with a Persian-Arabian flair. Control the Cannon Dancer Kirin, an acrobatic, highly skilled martial arts fighter, and fight your way through several stages while defeating enemy forces.

name: Clash: Artifacts of Chaos - Zeno Edition
description: Zeno Edition Includes: Base game; Supporter Pack: 2 Zeno Clash Armors, 3 Headwears for the Boy, Humiliation Artifact; Digital Artbook; Original Soundtrack

name: Monster Energy Supercross 6: The Official Videogame
description: Mud, sweat, adrenaline, and fun: all the best the motocross and dirt bike world has to offer awaits you in the new Monster Energy Supercross 6!

name: Mato Anomalies: Day One Edition
description:
The Day One Edition of Mato Anomalies includes:
- The game
- Exclusive artbook with over 30 pages of stunning concept art of the game

name: Looking Up I See Only a Ceiling
description: A short psychological adventure about a stressed girl who wants to explore her ceiling.

name: Alkurai
description: Alkurai is a 4 player online co-op fantasy horror game. An infamous Alchemist has murdered the king and seized Alkurai's throne. It is up to you and your party to evade his horrid miscreations and restore the kingdom to what it once was.

name: Volley Pals
description: A chaotic, cartoon style arcade volleyball game with local multiplayer for up to 4 people. It's designed as a party game with each level featuring different themes and mechanics.

name: Fatal Frame: Mask of the Lunar Eclipse
description:
When the protagonists were children, they visited the isolated island of "Rogetsu Isle" to celebrate the Rogetsu Festival. In the midst of the celebrations, they suddenly disappeared. The game begins when the girls decide to go back and visit the island again in search of their lost memories of that day.

Attempt to repel encroaching ghosts, relying solely on the faint glow of a flashlight and the Camera Obscura; a camera with the ability to photograph unimaginable things.

name: ATCo2
description: ATCo2 is a casual/serious game for aviation fans that want to learn more about sustainability impacts of aviation. Play as an ATC, control your planes on different locations around the world, and keep an eye on your total CO2 emissions.

name: Peaky Blinders: The King's Ransom
description: Infiltrate their criminal underworld, earn the Shelbys’ trust and prove you have what it takes to join the Peaky Blinders in The King’s Ransom, a dark VR action-adventure based on the epic gangster drama.

name: Creepy Tale 3: Ingrid Penance
description: As punishment for her transgressions, Ingrid is sent to hell. As she struggles through the darkness that hungers to consume her heart, she makes her way toward redemption. Her fate is in your hands.

name: Ray'z Arcade Chronology
description: Ray'z Arcade Chronology is a compilation developed by M2 and includes the original Arcade versions of the three games in the Ray series, with the later two titles also having all-new HD remasters.

name: Skull and Bones: Limited Edition
description: Enter the Golden Age of Piracy as you sail through rich merchant trade routes. Embody an insatiable pirate captain, dive into the battle for the ruling of the Indian Ocean and become the most feared pirate, alone or with your gang of up to 5 players.

name: Idea
description: Idea is a game about discovering and sharing. Explore gorgeous landscapes, roll down highways and stumble upon welcoming cottages and abandoned dumpsters. Help your ideas find their way – and share them with the world when they stop, before beginning your journey anew.

name: Germinal
description: Help Greg stay healthy during an epidemic as he jumps, hovers and cleans his way through quarantine with his disinfectant jetpack.Witness his developing mysophobia(fear of contamination) express itself in the increasingly difficult game play, and replay the game to master the mechanics or search for more story bits.

name: Haulin' Oats
description: Haulin' Oats is a board game about truck driving, the US highways, and oatmeal. Four players compete to deliver their cargo then return to the warehouse while avoiding various dangers along the way. Take part in sabotage, races, curses, and more to get the upper-hand.

name: PolyShot
description: E-Girls group was born as anti-male groups came together. This cute but wild girl group aims to take over the BoyZ clan and create chaos across Polylandia to enforce their will. We need to stop them!

name: Ace Racer
description: Ace Racer is a racing mobile game introducing innovative vehicles with ultimate skills. Experience various actual cars from legendary vehicle manufacturers like Porsche and Nissan, along with our own custom creations. Each vehicle has its own ultimate skills. So, what are you waiting for? Start your engines and experience our own spin on vehicle ultimates along stunning race tracks! Let's race with ultimate skills to feel ultimate thrills.

name: Tiny Troopers: Global Ops
description: Attention! Tiny Troopers: Global Ops is a fast-paced arcade twin-stick shooter in which you lead an elite squad of Tiny Troopers on action-packed missions to take down hordes of unscrupulous enemies from all corners of the world!

name: Clash: Artifacts of Chaos
description: You are Pseudo, a powerful warrior living as a recluse in the strange land of Zenozoik. When you become embroiled in a quest for the Artifacts of Chaos, everything changes. Explore the world and defeat your enemies, but never forget the sacred rules of the Ritual.

name: Masterplan Tycoon
description: Masterplan Tycoon is a real-time strategy game about building interconnected chains of resources in a minimalist visual style. The nodes are buildings. The pins are contact points between them. The links are supply lines. Create the largest logistics system possible.

name: Guardians Frontline
description: Guardians Frontline is a Sci-Fi VR shooter where you wield powerful weapons and command robot armies that help you fight off enemies in single-player, co-op, and PvP game modes. Complete with a campaign, an in-game level editor and hundreds of community created maps.

name: 24 Killers
description: Out in the Indian Ocean somewhere is a tiny desert island where a multiverse spanning drama is unfolding. You play as Home, a cursed super intelligence bound to a soldier's corpse by an alien named Moon.

name: Sea of Craft
description: Sea of Craft is a realistic physics-based construction and adventure game. Hundreds of building materials and weapons to choose from, giving you infinite options for your creations.

name: Terraformers
description: Terraformers is a 3X game with roguelite elements in which you terraform Mars. Explore the planet's wonders, exploit its resources and expand by settling new cities. Start the terraforming process: warming the planet, creating oceans and spreading life!

name: The Last Spell
description: Defend the last bastion of humanity with your squad of heroes! Exterminate fiendish monsters with magic and brute force by night and re-build your battered city defenses by day in this tactical RPG with rogue-lite mechanics.

name: Figment 2: Creed Valley
description: Figment 2: Creed Valley is an encore to Figment. Dusty and Piper have restored peace in The Mind, however, a new adversary is threatening its balance. Our two heroes must travel to Creed Valley, where The Mind’s beliefs and ideals are formed, to face their most menacing and theatrical foe so far.

name: Unjou no Fairy Tale
description:
This is a fairy tale that takes place in the lawless town of Kaguya that floats in the sky. Tsukasa runs Café Amelia with a lone employee, the self-proclaimed future great magician Natsu. However, they have another side to them; they are part of a team of justice-fighters that do everything from preventing thefts to serving as personal guards. The other members of the team are also frequent visitors to the coffee shop: the songstress Daria and the strongest swordswoman Makoto.

One day, Natsu and Makoto rescued a princess who was looking for her missing older brother. This girl Yuki was actually Tsukasa’s imouto…

name: Hellscreen
description: "Hellscreen is a single player level based first-person shooter for PC, in the fast, frantic style of classic FPS games from the 1990s (such as Doom, Quake, Unreal etc)."

name: Took: The Immortal Hero
description: A hardcore 2D action platformer developed by one person. Play as a memoryless rabbit TOOK to explore the vast Moon Cave world and defeat dozens of powerful enemies, collect the treasures scattered in this world and regain the glory of the Moon Up Group!

name: AAA Clock 2: Premium Edition
description: This bundle includes the third Color Set DLC with pale pink, blue and yellow.

name: Fruit Game
description: Fruit Game is a very easy-to-play puzzle game. Aim, drop and stick fruits together to get a high score!

name: Please Don't Hate Christmas
description: You haven't celebrated Christmas for years. This year, you decided to return to your hometown—Snowflake Island, with your childhood friend, Albert. Albert treats you so well that you choose to stay forever. However, you forgot something in the past, and it's still not solved...

name: Daymare Stray
description: Help Daymare Folk find the stray. Who is the stray? Well, see for yourself.

name: Zup! Q
description: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions. The player's goal to keep the blue ball on the platform for 3 seconds in order to pass the level.

name: Monuments to Guilt
description: Take a first-person wander through Monuments to Guilt, a short exhibition exploring exclusionary design. Acquaint yourself with the core principles of this harmful practice, re-evaluate the objects you see every day and let guilt sit with you, for just a little while.

name: Rocket League: Season 10
description:
It's time to unwind

Lost long ago in the shifting sands of Deadeye Canyon sat a secret treasure, undisturbed by the passing of time… until recently. Shocked explorers stumbled upon this unspoiled sanctuary, marveling at a time capsule of exotic wildlife and botanical wonders. Woken by an ancient spell, it appears the desert's heart has begun to beat once more.

Season 10 invites you to shift into neutral while you rest, relax, and collect a bounty of Items! Enjoy a peaceful Rocket Pass, explore a new Oasis Arena Variant, and take the legendary Volkswagen Golf II GTI for a spin.

Season 10 starts Wednesday, March 8!

name: Quiz Thiz Austria: Bronze Edition
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Cat Tales: Premium Edition
description: Get on the dragon and fly on an adventure! Run around the flowery meadow with the little cute kitties. Travel on the back of big cats. Grab a magic umbrella and admire the meadows and fields from above. Discover more than 30 themes with fairy tale characters and animals. Play with colors and painting tools.

name: Pixel Paint: Premium Edition
description: Choose from a wide range of drawings, and expand your pixel art gallery!

name: Brain Memory: Premium Edition
description:
Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills.
Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize challenges to one's taste.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 11
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Sker Ritual: Stranger Danger
description: Plague Sker Island and hypnotise all its residents with The Stranger, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Sker Ritual: Siren's Song
description: Captured and imprisoned on Sker Island years before, the Siren's Song can be heard for miles, entrancing all who listens, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Biatatá: Still Waters Run Deep
description: This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary consumable: Biatatá (Hunter), Cobra da Várzea (Scottfield Model 3 Spitfire), Proteção do Andarilho (Winfield 1893 Slate), and Língua de Fogo (Liquid Fire Bomb).

name: Super Vadimka X
description: Super Vadimka X - a free action video game made by two developers VadimBallzGame and HyperTheLoopa420 for Windows. This is the first Super Vadimka game for 16-bit style and the first game in the Super Vadimka X series, a spin-off of the original Super Vadimka series that started on the predecessor. The Super Vadimka X game was first released in honor of the International Women's Day holiday on March 8, 2023 and was released in Europe and America in the same year. The game takes place after the event 1 month ago, years after the original Super Vadimka, in a beautiful world inhabited by both people and "Monsters", the Evil Super Pupkin decided to somehow take over the world and kill the main character will the main character be able to survive.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Masyu
description: You won't use any letters or numbers in this original puzzle - the only hints are black circles and white circles. "Masyu" is a puzzle in which you draw a line through the spaces according to the rules. Learn the attributes of the black and white circles and you'll be able to play in no time. The patterns through which lines can be drawn are more numerous than you can imagine, and discovering tactical moves is also fun.

name: G-Mode Archives 44: Dragon x Dragon
description:
Training × blending × combat. Explore the field and raise the strongest dragon!

"DRAGON x DRAGON" is an RPG that captures with three elements: training, blending, and combat.

In order to defeat the dark dragon "Genesis" that plunged the world into chaos, the boy "Willow", a descendant of the dragon messenger, grows up with his partner dragon "Kermes".

Choose your favorite field from among the many exploration destinations and set off on an adventure.

The items that can be acquired depending on the field and the attributes of the wild dragon you live in are different, so let's go deep into the field while consulting with the remaining physical strength of "Kermes" and the items you have on hand.

The young "Kermes" returns to "1" every time you return from the search destination, but you can strengthen your basic ability by mixing the items you got in the middle of the search and giving them to "Kermes".

The effect varies depending on the material to be blended. Try a wide variety of combinations and raise them to be the strongest dragon.

name: The Magical Land of Canada
description: Our heroes must travel to Canada and are surprised to find out it's a real place and not fictional.

name: Chippy & Noppo
description:
"Chippy and Noppo" is an action puzzle that assembles parts into a toy!
Collect the parts in the factory, process the colors and shapes, and make the same toy as the blueprint.
Even if it's a little different, you might be able to clear it...!?
Because the factory manager is a bit careless.

name: Lattice Dancer
description: Experience the thrill of dodging lasers in this easy-to-learn, casual game. Your goal is simple. Dodge the lattice laser. Sharpen your spatial awareness and concentration skills with each round. Are you ready to dance with danger?

name: Leta Adventure
description: Through Spring, Autumn, Winter and Summer! Leta Adventure is a relaxing role-playing game where you must travel a journey in order to deliver a letter. Featuring many different locations, minigames and characters to meet... your Adventure awaits!

name: The Whisperer
description: Join Suzie on her journey to rescue her cute little friends.

name: Climber
description: This is a little adventure in the depths of a mysterious cave. Try on the role of a rescuer and try to save the lives of a team of missing cavers as quickly as possible. You will need concentration, discipline and strong hands, because the owners of these depths do not like uninvited guests.

name: Best Pearl
description: Best Pearl is a shooter where one of the sea inhabitants repels attacks, protecting the pearl he found. Be careful the steering wheel landing can hurt you. Don't let them get it. They must not reach her. You can handle it.

name: Crazy Clown
description: Crazy Clown - Top Down Shooter, a game in which you need to take your own and destroy all your abusers. You have not only a machine gun in your arsenal. Use all the variety of weapons and crush your enemies. Take revenge on them, clowns can not only make fun!

name: Fishjong
description: Dive into the magical world of underwater Mahjong. Test your skills again and again on more than 100 levels. Customize your tiles, sets, backgrounds and tile shapes. Take a load off with the game's relaxing music and meditative gameplay.

name: Antigravity Racing
description: Enter your antigravity racecraft vehicular and engage in thrilling combat races and get the podium at any costs! Use the power ups to your advantage and use pads to activate your stun gun, missiles or boosters to get to the finish line first! Neckbreaking race circuits are waiting to be raced on in high speed antigravity racecrafts. Choose between 10 different racecrafts each with its advantages and disadvantages. Upgrade your vehicle to your personal fit and create the ultimate winning machine! Race on!

name: Snafu
description: Alibaba, the caretaker of the Medieval Grow your Business Game notices a Glitch or Virus of some sort called Snafu has infiltrated the game files. NPCs begin to act strangely, textures look off, and I think - I think something is trying to hunt me down?

name: Heralds of Silence. Chapter one
description: Heralds of Silence is a first-person horror game. Solve complex puzzles, look for clues, dive into the darkness of empty corridors and, perhaps, you will discover the secrets of a mysterious scientific complex and the curse of the Silence.

name: That's a Cow: Extended Edition
description: Soar through the air and don't get milked in this cute game.

name: Paranormasight: The Seven Mysteries of Honjo
description:
How far would you go to bring someone back from the dead? Discover the depths that some will go to in this horror-adventure game.

Set in Honjo, Tokyo's Sumida ward during the Showa period (1926-89), this is the unsettling tale of those with the power to curse, derived from the gruesome real world urban legends: "The Seven Mysteries of Honjo."

Follow the cursed seven as they embark on a supernatural ordeal over a three-day period to realise their desperate hopes and dreams.

name: Poosh XL
description: Poosh XL is a neon-infused, one-button arcade score chaser. That's it! That pretty much says it all. If you like that first sentence you'll probably enjoy this game. (The spiritual successor to Ding Dong XL)

name: Sanctuary Saga
description: Protect your caravan and face the brutal Untamed Wilds in roguelite turn-based RPG Sanctuary Saga. Engage in row-based combat across multiple varied biomes and keep your group together using a dynamic relationship system.

name: DIG: Deep In Galaxies
description: DIG is an Action Roguelike for going solo or joining forces with up to 4 players. Get overpowered and blast your way through ever-changing scenarios to defeat The Overlord and restore freedom. Give'em hell in this galactic revolution!

name: The Widow's Boutique
description: Step into 1820s small town society in this historically accurate visual novel, filled with drama, dresses and danger.

name: A Game You Can Afford In This Economy
description: Everything is getting unaffordably expensive. Groceries. Bills. How long is this even sustainable? Enter the world of the protagonist, and find out if you have what it takes to turn your life around. A point-and-click, choice-driven adventure of modern survival.

name: Stadtleben
description: Stadtleben is a strategic city building game in which you place gardens, streets and buildings on squares to create a big city. Here you should build as many or high skyscrapers as possible in order to be able to plant more tiles.

name: Oni: Road to be the Mightiest Oni
description:
Break your enemy's heart to reclaim your pride.
Kuuta, a demon, once challenged a man to a battle and was defeated.
At last, he arrives at Kisejima Island. He and his partner Kazemaru, whom he met on the island, overcome their ordeal as one, gaining new strength along the way.
This time, will the duo be able to achieve victory?
Join Kuuta on his adventure to get revenge against Momotaro, a demon masquerading as a man.

name: Contraband Police
description: Take over the duties of a border guard inspector in a communist country of the 80's. Smuggling, corruption and forgery are the order of the day here. Be vigilant and earn the respect of your superiors.

name: Goblins of Elderstone
description: This Goblin Tribe Simulator brings a challenging blend of chaos and creativity to the city-building genre. Build dwellings, manage your resources, defend your goblins, and grow your tribe to face other races and even the Gods! Do you have what it takes to control the chaos and rule the unruly?

name: Sniper Elite 5: Trench Warfare Weapon Pack
description:
This FREE Weapons Pack gives you some devastating firepower perfect for close quarters combat in the shape of the Carl Gustav M/1945 SMG, the Trench Gun and a Double 1866 pistol.

The Carl Gustav M/1945, better known as the Swedish K, was adopted in 1945, taking features from various WWII firearms to produce a reliable and well-balanced sub-machine gun. Firing at 600 rounds-per-minute, the Gustav provides accurate single shots, whilst also offering great control in continuous fire.

A powerful pump-action shotgun, the Trench Gun first saw use by US Forces during World Wars I & II. Fed with 12-gauge shells from its 6-round tube magazine, it sacrifices range and fire rate for extreme damage in close quarters.

The Double 1866 is a double-barrel pocket pistol designed in the 19th Century as an easily concealable backup gun that can be drawn at speed. Despite only featuring a single-action trigger and producing a very low muzzle velocity, the D.1866's unique traits make for a powerful weapon at close range.

name: War Thunder: Type 16 (FPS) Pack
description:
This pack includes:

Type 16 (FPS) (Rank 6, Japan)
2000 Golden Eagles
Premium account for 15 days

name: War Thunder: F-4S Phantom II Pack
Friendzone
description: Friendzone is a visual novel-dating sim that began as a small hobby project for my friends, but evolved into a full-fledged dating sim. Featuring 12 romantic routes, 10-12 hours of original content (that's over 17,500 blocks of dialogue), and a plethora of minigames, Friendzone (using a wacky cast and zany situations) captures the cute, heartwarming, and sometimes awkward aspects of romance in high school. Whoops, that's the school bell. We'll see you in homeroom!

name: Dinky Kong
description: A demake of Donkey Kong in PICO-8 starring Minio and Dinky Kong.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Rough Landing - Mission and Weapon Pack
description: Season Pass Two kicks off with the release of an amazing new mission called Rough Landing. Allied airmen, including a high-ranking officer with critical intelligence, have been shot down over a dense woodland and are now being hunted by Nazi troops. Karl’s mission is to find the hidden pilots and retrieve the intelligence. Set deep in a forest and featuring a cramped mine shaft, expect plenty of close quarters combat which will test your skills.

name: Tomb Raider: The Tower Bridge Experience
description:
This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the TombEngine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This level started as a training ground and experimental ground for the author to get back into level building, and push the new TombEngine to its limits. As part of Matrix54's Revival Challenge he decided to pay homage to the late Dhama's Tower Bridge levels created in 2001. As a test he attempted to create Tower Bridge in Tomb Raider with its proper dimensions, a feat wouldn't be possible before TEN (TombEngine). And it just grew from there!

name: Skinner & The Superintendent
description: Help Skinner to do an unforgettable luncheon for Chalmers, with 9 possible endings!

name: War Thunder: Sky Guardians
description: The first units for the French naval tree, new and updated graphical effects and data structure optimization along with ejection seats for selected modern jets. Amongst the 43 new as well as updated vehicle models, one can't help but mention the real behemoth - the Char2, the agile AH-6M "Little Bird" helicopter or the first French light cruiser; Duguay-Trouin! In addition to all this, the winter version of the location "Seversk", a new location for fans of avionics - Pyrenees, and as always, many improvements and fixes! Let's welcome the "Sky Guardians" update!

name: Unprompted
description: A.I. is here. Type to guess the words used to create A.I. artworks, while slowly uncovering A.I.'s reflections on its own work. Come investigate more than 1,500 artworks made by A.I. across 7 carefully curated galleries.

name: Space Tail: Every Journey Leads Home - Deluxe Edition
description:
Space Tail is a 2.5D adventure platformer, which immerses the player in a deep, emotional plot, and lets him explore new planets and interact with alien civilizations.

This game includes 2 new locations in the Homecoming DLC.

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia: Complete Edition
description: Explore the incredible world of nature with a charming little mouse. Beautiful, hand-painted graphics and an interesting collection of facts will awaken the naturalist's soul in everyone.

name: League of Enthusiastic Losers: Premium Edition
description: Just because others call you a loser, doesn't mean you are one. Make the journey to the 90s Moscow and experience an adventure about friendship and finding your true self.

name: Beat!: After the Summer - Another Season Episode
description: This is a story about 4 girls, who had a desire to become an idol. After the break-up of ♡beAt, they are facing a new challenge and about to stand out.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 10
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 9
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Dead by Daylight: Tools of Torment Chapter
description: The Tools Of Torment Chapter features a new Killer - The Skull Merchant - and two new Survivors, Thalita and Renato Lyra. Purchasing this add-on unlocks 3 exclusive Cosmetics: The Skull Merchant's Slipshod Prototype, Thalita's Golden Ambition, and Renato's Golden Touch.

name: Hotel Renovator: Palace Furniture Set
description: This content requires the base game Hotel Renovator on Steam in order to play.Your guests deserve more than just a superb night’s sleep. Elevate the rooms of your Hotel with a 32-item set of prestigious furniture made of sumptuous fabrics and rich colors. Create a heavenly sense of luxury from a unique blend of classic and glamour.

name: Someday You'll Return: Director's Cut
description: How far would you go if your daughter didn’t come home? Someday You’ll Return: Director’s Cut is a first-person psychological horror. This story-driven game offers enhanced features, an improved story, and additional content. Enter the woods if you dare and begin a search you’ll never forget.

name: Moth House
description: Moth House is a collectible horror game that is an adventure game in an old house where many varieties of moths dine, which you will catch. The house is very dark and all you find in your pockets is a box of matches, with which you can light your way a little.

name: Emoto
description: Twitch Emotes Guessing Game.

name: Rabbi-T
description: Save Wilson Toys Inc. from the villainous robot ACTO and be a hero. Rabbi-T is a 2D running action game that pursues destruction and speed. Destroy obstacles to run faster. Reach the boss's weakness as fast as possible.

name: Tap Sword
description: Be the best blacksmith!

name: I Heard There are Monsters Here
description: "I Heard There Are Monsters Here" is a pixel , idle game. The monsters from the beast Land can never be killed forever. At the same time, the Land has countless minerals and wealth. Only when you have courage and wisdom at the same time, can you survive on the beast continent.

name: SharkKing
description: You play as a rogue shark, battle your way up the food chain and become the shark king

name: Crossroad of Worlds: Mirrors to Other Worlds - Collector's Edition
description: Detective, adventure awaits! Once again amazing worlds full of puzzles and riddles await you. Test your deduction, solve cases and help people all over the multiverse!

name: Not Anyone's Business but My Own
description: Navigate a local princess through the pages of a hand-crafted fairy tale and help her solve the mystery of a golden ring in this narrative-driven point-and-click adventure game with multiple endings.

name: Jigsaw Puzzles: Fantasy Landscapes
description: Enjoy 30 puzzles of increasing difficulty featuring original artwork of stunning fantasy landscapes!

name: Tank Online: War Shooting Simulator
description: Enjoy the thrilling action of tank warfare in Tank Online! Experience unique tank game with stunning visuals and realistic physics. Join the fight now!

name: Fabulous Field Trip
description: Fabulous Field Trip is an island excursion game full of learning and fun suitable for children aged 9-12 and adults of all ages.

name: The Outer Worlds: Spacer's Choice Edition
description: The Outer Worlds: Spacer's Choice Edition is the ultimate way to play the award-winning RPG from Obsidian Entertainment and Private Division. Including the base game and all DLC, this remastered masterpiece is the absolute best version of The Outer Worlds.

name: The Obscura Experiment
description: Anabasis & Co. welcomes you to the family - we’re so glad to have you here! Your mandate as part of this research project will be to monitor and document a new energy form: the [Redacted]. To begin, let’s review your perso- oh? We’re detecting some anomalies near you… care to investigate?

name: Pitball: Winter Waifus
description: Pinball-like arcade fun with a variety of challenging levels and cute winter-themed waifus.

name: Gunlocked: The 2nd Gunning
description: A sci-fi action roguelike in space. Gunlocked is a twin stick shooter without the twin stick. Choose from multiple unique characters, dodge enemies, equip powerful upgrades, fight huge bosses, and drink your morning coffee with your free hand. Then do it all again for a brand new experience.

name: Made in Ohio
description: Be ready for your adventures in OHIO. Fight Bosses, destroy your enemies, collect corns and become The King of OHIO!

name: Outlanders: Heir of the Roads
description: Faraway in the arid outskirts of the Outlands, right on the edge of a neverending sea of dunes and treacherous desert roads, a small provincial town is planning something unprecedented in its history: a journey to the capital.

name: Fire Emblem: Engage - Expansion Pass: Wave 3
description: Obtain Emblem Bracelets to Engage with more Emblem characters and get support items and new accessories with the Paid DLC for the Fire Emblem Engage game. Purchase and download the Fire Emblem Engage: Expansion Pass today for Wave 1 and meet Edelgard, Dimitri, and Claude (as a one Emblem Bracelet) and take on Divine Paralogues to get Tiki as an Emblem character. As more waves become available, you can test your mettle in even more Divine Paralogues, obtain Emblem characters and accessories, and experience a brand-new story with added characters and locations.

name: Kapital Punishment 22XX
description: Battle relentless cyborg police in a grim 23rd century dystopia. Experience fast-paced, bloody combat in this retro-inspired beat-'em up, action platformer. Recruit comrades and collect upgrades as you traverse hazardous environs to reach KAPITAL and take down the oligarchs in charge!

name: Sands
description: "The sands have no pity." The inhabitants of Zetta-115 often say that. The same they instill in their children from an early age. And this is what they whisper about, sitting in their dilapidated shacks, waiting for the impending storm...

name: Outlanders: Flood and Fire
description: In the northern regions, across its icy valleys and jagged peaks, five clans of vicious mountain folk live in constant rivalry. When a sudden rise in water level forces them to start anew in the upper regions of the mountains, they will have to adopt more sustainable habits in order to survive.

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - The Last Sarkorians
description: The nation of Sarkoris was destroyed by the demons, yet the last of its people are ready to fight back. Meet Ulbrig Olesk, a Sarkorian shifter capable of turning into a mighty griffon. Explore a new region, fight new enemies... And maybe even find new love!

name: Little Witch Nobeta: Bunny and Bear Kigu Skin Bundle
description:
The Bunny and Bear Kigu Skin Bundle includes:
- Bunny costume
- Bear kigurumi costume

name: Space Tail: Homecoming
description: In Space Tail: Homecoming, you will travel together with the dog astronaut Bea to visit the home planets of comet Rose and the robot 808BY.

name: Little Witch Nobeta: Day One Edition
description:
The Day One Edition of Little Witch Nobeta includes:
- The game
- A reversible cover sleeve
- 6 Postcards
- A Sticker Sheet
- An A2 Double-sided Poster
- Collector's Box

name: Fair Princess Under Futa Curse
description: Play as a beautiful princess who was cursed by an evil witch to become a futanari. Explore her sexual transformation in this non-linear life simulation visual novel where you get to choose which actions the princess takes. You are in charge of her sexual exploration and sluttyness.

name: Halo Infinite: Season 3 - Echoes Within
description: Season 3, titled "Echoes Within," will include new maps and modes, sandbox items, expanded customization, a 100 tier battlepass, and the Custom Games Browser feature.

name: Vivid/Stasis
description: A hybrid rhythm-mystery game about uncovering the dark truth about a mysterious organization.

name: Stellarium
description: Ride around the many galaxies of Stellarium in a hectic vertical bullet hell, facing off all kinds of creatures and dodging giant storms of bullets.

name: Pi.exe
description: Take the role of an antivirus software within the world of an operating system, eliminating malware spawns in a challenging, platforming quest!

name: Steelborn
description: Steelborn - is a run and gun platformer game inspired by the classics and made by a team of Abuse, Ranger-X, Contra, Metal Slug, Blaster Master and H.E.R.O fans.

name: An Indie Game a Month: Unreal Journey
description: A collection of games developed for a month by a single person. January - A platformer game with a Brave Little Cat. Jump around and avoid enemies to collect the required power crystals that will allow you to be transported to the next level once you reach the runestones.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Hell Frozen Over - Battlepack
description: Hell Frozen Over is an expansion module for Heroes of the Pacific. Play nine scenarios on a unique 22”x34” Map that accurately depicts Attu’s harsh terrain. The terrain varies over eight levels in height and features boot-sticking Muskeg, rock-strewn Rough, precipitous Cliffs.

name: Romancelvania
description: Imagine Castlevania meets The Bachelor in this hilarious and enthralling genre mashup that will satisfy your (blood)lust. Will Drac find “Love at First Bite,” or will he discover “Love Sucks”? Tune in to find out!

name: Hotel Renovator
description: Build the hotel of your dreams! You’ll welcome guests from all over the world. Use your starting cash to rebuild and furnish as many rooms as possible. Create a place that smacks the golden age, a new exclusive hotel. Get that 5-star review!

name: Kawaii Neko Girls 2
description: Kawaii Neko Girls 2 - It's a relaxing anime puzzle game with cute kawaii hentai neko girls. Solve puzzles and collect all the pictures. Enjoy high quality artwork.

name: Brawl Stars: Mystery At The Hub
description: Sin descripción

name: Yep It's More Skiing
description: You won a beauty competition and thereby the accompanying grand prize of a skiing holiday at an exclusive ski resort - YIPEE! After two days of skiing and sitting in front of a cozy fireplace with hot chocolate in the evenings, you develop an aggravated case of boredom. So the following day you start looking for a challenge and lo and behold you have now found one: The ski slope called 'The Devil's Run'. This slope has been closed for a long time due to excessive injuries and accidents. You obviously ignore all warnings and have decided to attempt the run. Can you guess how this will end?

name: Demon Turf: The Tower
description: You've been stripped of all your powers and there's only one way to regain them: Climb the Jester's impossibly high tower! Can you overcome all of the hazardous challenges and gain back your abilities, one by one? All it takes is one slip up and you'll have to start over... You'll be sweating, you'll be swearing but with each attempt you'll climb just a bit higher... And just that much closer to beating this incredibly tough challenge! Good luck, fellow demon!

name: Fox Hunt Arena
description:
It’s a dystopian future. The year is 2112 and you find yourself on FOXHUNT, the world’s most popular game show.

But Foxhunt is not like any other game show. Of course there is prize money, Up to a million dollars, but in order to win, you must survive 7 rounds and 50 unique fields in the arena!

It will not be easy. There are three Hunters trying to kill you. You must fight through each round and collect the 2 codes that will set off the explosive charge placed in each Hunter’s neck.

There are objects stored in stations scattered around the arena that can help you. If you find yourself in a tight situation, use the Crossbow that you found. But watch out, someone dropped an XG-7 Laser-rifle into the Arena. Find it first!

Run fast, collect the cash, find every station, and fend off the Hunters before they find you….

Don’t let the audience down. give ‘em a good show!

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 7
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 4
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 3
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 5
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 2
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 6
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 8
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Doll's Liminal
description: Avoid or defeat dolls that move when you're not looking, take their bodies, and make your way to the 399th dimension. This is a short horror game of fear and strategy, an exploration survival horror.

name: Super Mario World: The Lost Adventure - Episode I Remastered
description:
The remaster aims to improve the quality of the hack and have it be more in line with the later episodes. Here are the changes:

New levels
New Music
New custom graphics
New custom enemies
New custom bosses
New level order
Redesigned overworld map
Rebalanced difficulty
And more…

name: Roots of Tomorrow: Urban Agriculture
description: The urban agriculture scenario is a paid DLC of Roots of Tomorrow. It takes place in the Ile-de-France region, and its goal is to show the diversity of urban agriculture. Your goal: 10 years to "turn the city green".

name: Dark City: International Intrigue
description: A magical mystery across three of the world's largest cities!

name: Quiz Thiz Austria
description: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Platinum Edition
description: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys Platinum Edition is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks. Enjoy new decorations and get ready for loads of fun.

Tap the buttons to place numbers on them so that they sum up to 5. The numbers can sum up to 5 along the row, column or diagonally.
Numbers get cleared up when they add to 5 so that more numbers can be placed. When none of the rows/columns/diagonals add to 5 and the 9x9 cells fill up, the game is over. The game supports two modes - infinite and timed mode. Friends can challenge each other for high scores in timed mode.

name: Datiddle
description: A Wordle clone using data and analytics terms.

name: Dungeon Hunter Survival
description: Dungeon hunter survival a game that offers you hours of fun. DHS combines strategy, RPG and Rouge like game stages to extend the your enjoyment.

name: Good Luck Baby!
description: An out of this world yuri visual novel about falling in love, defeating an evil Empress, and finding a magic baby on your crush’s doorstep.

name: Conur Life
description: Survive the streets of San Hugo facing all kinds of problems in this open world located in Argentina.

name: Drift Experience Japan: Supporter Edition
description: Get the Supporter Edition of Drift Experience Japan and enhance your experience with new maps and extra content!

name: Flowa
description: A relaxing 2D puzzle game about watering and collecting flowers. Plan an efficient route to the goal, complete bonus challenges, and collect as many flowers as you can!

name: Riding Horse School
description: It's time to make new friends!

name: Milo no Senki 3
description: In this new entry to the turn-based tactical-RPG Milo no Senki serie, Lord Milo and his group of companions will travel to the realm of the dead in order to bring back their departed friend, Prince Nelson...

name: The Devilry Reservation
description: A faceless PSS agent visits a "reservation" due to complaints from its residents. Deal with the problems of evil spirits and reveal their mysteries and secrets. Explore a world once hidden from people. Get to know the mythological stars and their life stories.

name: Erannorth Chronicles: Untold Tales and Legends
description: Experience a richer, more distinct, and dangerous world with the fourth Erannorth Chronicles expansion. "Untold Tales and Legends" will expand the world seamlessly with new Narrative Events, Challenges, Enemies, and Cards.

name: Sakura Succubus 7
description: After successfully wooing Stephania, the princess of Astoria, Hiroki takes her on a tour of Tokyo alongside Elizabeth, her maid, and Cosmos, the ditzy, airheaded e-girl. Things take a turn for the sinister, however, when somebody begins to stalk them…

name: CalmLine
description: Overcome levels with the help of various tools and your mind. Are you sure it's easy?

name: Dead Cells: Return to Castlevania Bundle
description: Slay countless foes in fast-paced combat in the award-winning action roguelite Dead Cells and storm Dracula's Castle with classic weapons in the Return to Castlevania DLC.

name: Dead Cells: Medley of Pain Bundle
description: Play the award-winning action roguelite Dead Cells and its 4 original DLCs, plus unlock Castlevania content with the Return to Castlevania DLC.

name: Burg Wimmel
description: In Burg Wimmel the player has to find black and white hand-painted objects in the setting of a medieval castle and bring them to colorful life.

name: Rayland 2
description: Welcome to Rayland. The inhabitants of this island use the energy coming from the laser beams to survive and to transport this energy they use the repeating cubes.

name: Swords & Bones 3
description: The Swords & Bones saga reaches its third chapter! Inspired by past classics 2D action-platformer games, get ready to fight your way through more than 50 levels full of with enemies, traps and pitfalls. RPG elements enrich the gaming experience.

name: Dead Cells: Return to Castlevania
description: The inspiration behind it all returns to its 2D action roots! Castlevania’s unforgettable characters & gothic setting meet the fast-paced combat of the award-winning roguelite Dead Cells in this unprecedented collaboration.

name: Talus
description: Control Talus in this challenging boss rush where you'll face powerful enemies to reach your mysterious goal

name: Ka: Keepers & Assassins
description: Ka: Keepers & Assassins is dark fantasy multiplayer 3rd person battle arena game, 4 players against each other.Collect three crystals in a certain time and get them to the center of the arena, in the meantime it is necessary to find better gear against the opponents.

name: Ghostly Moans
description: Spirits have been possessing people in the kingdom and a young priestess named Mia has become well-known for her diplomatic way to exorcise these creatures. Follow her in search of the ones responsible for this situation.

name: Final Profit: A Shop RPG
description: FINAL PROFIT is a story driven shop-sim RPG. Gather products and find customers. Spend your hard-earned profits on upgrades and investments. Make far-reaching choices as you expand your business. And explore a world full of secrets on your quest to defeat capitalism by becoming the best at it!

name: Swords Fantasy: Battlefield
description: Swords Fantasy: Battlefield is a game from the 3rd person, including battles with swords.

name: The Things You Do For Love
description:
A dark romantic-comedy where you get to play as a hopeless yandere who is desperately trying to understand their newfound, romantic feelings all while taking down the competition.

Whether you decide to stalk your crush, eliminate your rivals, or make new friends, just go out there and win some love — no matter what, no matter how!

name: Guessr.tv
description: Guess the view count. You will be presented with a random Twitch stream and you have to guess how many viewers they have.

name: Waste Labs
description:
You are the last space marine at the Nuke Testing base on the Moon all of your friends are dead and you only have a pistol, so what are you gonna do about it?

Waste Labs is a megawad for Doom 1 with 3 episodes.

name: Promise of Lingyun
description: Promise of Lingyun is an archaistic role-playing game featuring hand-drawn Chinese ink painting style. Play as the main character to work for the welfare of the country and people in a mysterious palace of millenniums ago. The larger gameplay variety and random explorations overwhelms players with the love and hatred intertwined in the palace.

name: Boatgator
description: Sin descripción

name: F-4 Phantom II: Sky Defender
description: Sin descripción

name: Kate
description: Sin descripción

name: Trainwreck
description: Sin descripción

name: A Dire Emergency in Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Winter Intrusion
description: Sin descripción

name: Mundo SBT
description: Explore the Mundo SBT with other players and live an amazing and unique experience by choosing your style, making new friends, participating in exciting competitions, and decorating your house.

name: SSSnaker
description:
A Snake X Bullet Hell roguelite shooter that no one's ever seen!
Grow to ginormous proportions and blast your enemies to kingdom come! It's Sssnaker!
In the dangerous dungeon depths, your snake won't just grow longer, it'll also get stronger!

name: Timeguessr
description:
A game of simulated historical and geographical knowledge. Players must pinpoint the location of a photograph and the year by dropping a location pin on a map and select the year the photograph was taken.

Points are awarded for distance from correct location and year.

name: Crux
description: Crux is a fast-paced single-player arena shooter roguelike, where you face waves of enemies, unique bossfights and earn powerful magic abilities across 13 arenas. Master your fluid movement, trusty arsenal and the power of the blood gods to reach the top of the CRUX Champions Leaderboard!

name: My Summertime Girlfriend
description:
Your grades are plummeting, and it looks like you’re going to be held back a year… That is, until your teacher suggests you try attending summer school. You have nothing else to lose, so why not? You resign yourself to another boring summer, but it turns out the summer school is part of a beach resort full of beautiful girls who all seem excited to get to know you!

The program only runs for a month, but you quickly learn to live alongside your three rambunctious roommates and help them solve their problems. It’s not long before you realize that these girls are interested in more than just a study buddy… Can you handle the heat?

name: Hentai Casual Slider 3
description: Enjoy this new casual puzzle with dozens of nice illustrations for you to enjoy and relax. With an open gallery for simply relaxing and some voices too!

name: Solo
description: (Not) a lonely night.

name: Air Star
description: Throw Planes, Buy Upgrades, and Place Towers to defend against the oncoming waves of luggage! With 50+ unique upgrades to buy, discover new builds run after run. Unlock tons of froggy cosmetics in this Character Tower Defense!

name: Saccharine Pale
description: Saccharine Pale is a "Slash 'n Parry Nemesis Feud" with a DEEPLY robust, intuitive, and revolutionary combat system! Launch your rival, the Stiltfox, into the air with a well timed parry to juggle it with attacks, or slam it into a solid surface and see what happens!

name: Transport Fever 2: Console Edition
description: The console port of Transport Fever 2, allowing for the use of controllers.

name: Slashers: Great Circus
description: Extension of the original map "Little circus" with a greater amplitude, difficulty and proportions.

name: Apex Point
description: Apex Point has been in development since 2018 by a group of friends that aim to create a car enthusiast's dream game. It is an open world game that aims to immerge you into the Japanese car culture by providing a huge variety of customizations and race types so you can choose your own path

name: Hotdog Quest: One With Everything
description: Go on a quest to obtain a hotdog in this highly stylised 3rd person platforming adventure!

name: Silver Axe: The Honest Elf
description: Classic 2D platformer, play as a nimble elf and dash through the ancient fairytale forest. Defeat powerful Insomniac creatures, cast spells by combining four elements to summon thunder and entangle flame. Collect the heart of the goddess, unleash the hidden power of your Silver Axe.

name: Anemoiapolis
description:
You have fallen into a strange and haunted underground neighborhood. Discover its origins and escape with your life - and sanity - intact.

Anemoiapolis is a short atmospheric terror game about liminal spaces. Have you ever been in an empty airport, or a school at night? This game attempts to recreate that experience.

name: The Abandoned House
description: "The Abandoned House" is a 3D Horror game where you play as a ghost and your job is to help and guide the NPC Girl in escaping the house while also avoiding the hostile Monster that lurks in the shadows.

name: Doraemon Giga Pad
description: Doraemon GIGA Pad is a portable tablet by Bandai. The tablet contains various educational games based on the Doraemon series.

name: Olden Peak
description: A short, challenging soulslike with metroidvania elements. Made in PICO 8 by Abhi Sundu. Olden Peak is a melee combat-focused metroidvania with some soulslike elements like limited healing flasks and stamina.

name: Wounded Summer Baby
description: Sin descripción

name: ToyLand
description: Toyland is a world of abandoned and forgotten toys. Please help 'Hana' crash landing on this Toyland go back to the real world!!

name: Zombie Survivals 18+
description: Zombie Survivals 18+ is a blend of top-down shooter and visual novel. The world of the game is the ruins of the city after the zombie apocalypse. The enemies are hordes of zombies who want to kill the main character.

name: Dinogen Online
description: Action-packed 2D multiplayer top-down shooter. Play as a human or dinosaur with hundreds of weapons, game modes, and maps!

name: Scrap Games
description: Build and program your own fighting robot out of scraps. Win prizes and find more scrap materials to build improvements and new weapons. Teach your robot new moves and strategies. Win fights and challenges and become the ultimate hero of the Scrap Games!

name: The Space-Eating Croc
description:
The Space-Eating Croc is a mystery adventure game influenced by classic horror RPG Maker games. Inspect your surroundings to find clues, and solve puzzles to progress.

Explore the mysterious hotel by controlling a mysterious man and a suspicious hotelier. Face the dark truth hidden deep inside the metaphorical spaces within the hotel, and find the monster hidden in between the rifts of space.

name: Got Reincarnated into a World of RPG Full of NPCs...
description: The main character dies in the real world and gets reincarnated as "Mobuo" in a fantasy world of swords and magic. However, the world only contained NPCs... And when he finds out he can do anything to them...

name: Anemoiapolis: Chapter 1
description: A short atmospheric terror game about liminal spaces. Escape the grasps of an underground neighborhood that is equal parts comforting and disturbing. If you've explored a dead mall, a foreclosed pool, or a school at night, you might already know what it's like to be in Anemoiapolis.

name: VRnoid
description: Classic bricks breaker game meets Air Hockey in VR. Enjoy the action-sport game with variety of levels and boss fights. Compete or Team up with mouse player, in Pong and Arcade modes.

name: Chakan for Hexen
description: A 3D remake of the Sega Genesis Game Chakan as a mod for Hexen.

name: Bloodreaper
description:
Farm. Kill.
Inspired by the Evil Farming Game
WASD/Arrows and Space
Playtime: 10-15 minutes

name: Loneliest Depths
description:
What mysteries await beneath the oceans surface?

Step inside your diving bell and venture into the deepest depths of the Bitter Maw Trench, encountering a vast array of dazzling ocean life and documenting your discoveries!

Press the central switch to engage the diving bell’s viewing lantern, providing high voltage florescent light to even the lowest depths of the ocean floor.

name: Serapis Online
description:
Serapis Online, an MMORPG, intricately immerses players in the rich cultures of ancient China, Arabia, and Europe. Reviving the historical Silk Road—a vital trade route connecting Asia and Europe—Serapis Online offers a journey through forgotten tales of glory and adventure.

Embark on an exploration of a new world, brimming with engaging and ever-evolving adventures, as players experience the magic of ancient civilizations firsthand.

name: Castlevania: The Adventure DX
description: Castlevania: The Adventure is a fan favorite Game Boy game that was included in Konami GB Collection Vol. 1. That compilation did provide a much needed color injection, however it was full of weird color choices and incorrect overlays on backgrounds resulting in a marred experience. This release intends to correct as many of those flaws as possible, increase the quality overall, and make the game a dedicated stand-alone experience.

name: Sid Meier's Civilization VI: Fiammetta Pack
description:
A mod that adds the Laterano civilization with its Leader Fiammetta.
Playing as her gives you:

- Unique district (Laterano Notarial Hall)
- Unique buildings (Tower of Revelations & Requiem Church)
- Unique unit (Apostolic Gun Knights)
- Unique city project (Summit of Nations)
- Unique governors (Mostima & Lemuen)
- And much more!

name: The Little Match Girl 3: The Escalus Manifold
description: "The Snow Queen controls her servants with Shards from the Mirror of Belial," Ebenezer Scrooge explained.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 1
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: TS Marketplace: FahrBar Charity Coach Pack
description: Enjoy a nice drink and take in stunning scenery on relaxing Swiss rail journeys; the unique and legendary Projekt fahrBar coach comes to Train Simulator Classic courtesy of Rivet Games!

name: Programmer Dungeon Knightress: Samurai Pack
description: In this DLC, get "Jack the Samurai" as a playable character, customization of the level selection map and 5 additional new levels.

name: Flif
description:
Baby angels save the world from drought! Bonky glidey flappy physics platforming! Explore clouds & sky ruins & collect raindrops!

Commissioned for Indiepocalypse #38.

name: Pokemon Bois
description: Humorous old-school Pokemon fangame.

name: Kimono Cats
description: Kimono Cats is a charming, easy to play game for all ages. Select your main-character cat and a companion-cat, and walk through a Japanese "matsuri" Festival, making your companion happy. Throw darts at moving bubbles to give your companion a gift from a stall, play a mini-game, or encounter characters. Earn coins, to progress along the road to new areas that have new things to discover. Coins also allow you to purchase houses, shops, and decorative objects to design and build your own unique village. You can take care of your village and visit other players' villages, earning bonus coins, leaving gifts, messages, and stamps in their guest books. Play online or offline. Kimono Cats is designed to help you smile a bit more every day.

name: Grace Online
description: Grace Online is a captivating 3D fantasy MMORPG (massively-multiplayer online role-playing game) that offers players an immersive experience, allowing them to explore a rich, expansive world filled with secrets and unique creatures. In Grace Online, we believe in player autonomy, which means we guide you through the basics, but there's no hand-holding beyond that. As a result, countless hidden treasures and mysteries await your discovery.

name: Daydream: Prologue
description: Little Griffin is trapped in an ominous new world with his only friend, Birly the teddy bear. Solve clever puzzles and encounter terrifying creatures as the pair embark on a journey to discover what lurks beyond their nightmares.

name: Monster Survivors
description:
Ready to put your skills to the test and survive the most frightening creatures to defeat your opponents? Monster Survivor: The Ultimate Multiplayer Survival Experience!

In Monster Survivor, you'll face off against bats, skeletons, ghosts, and more in a race to be the last player standing. With each creature you eliminate, you'll collect their souls and use them to power up, boost your skills, and unleash magic cards on your enemies. It's a battle for survival, and only the bravest and most cunning players will emerge victorious.

name: Paranormal Files: Silent Willow - Collector's Edition
description: When clues lead you to the Silent Willow Mental Hospital, you find more than you bargained for as a dark shadow entity tries to keep both you and your case buried for good! Will this mystery be too much for your top-notch team?

name: My House
description: My House is a mod for Doom II designed and released by Veddge as a tribute, reportedly to have been unearthed from an old floppy disk belonging to his deceased long-time friend Tom who started work in 1999 with some UDMF features added by Veddge.

name: Inquiry for Justice
description: The story of police officers who stand up against juvenile crime. And what about the protagonist, Justice's dark past?

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Muscle MILF
description: Physical labor is a tough gig but it can be very rewarding, especially when you can log some overtime hours with your buff busty boss as she begs to be bred!

name: Panzer Campaigns: Philippines ’44
description:
In Philippines ’44, as MacArthur you will command units from both the US Sixth and Eighth Armies as well as US Army Air Force and Naval air groups. The Japanese forces, led by General Yamashita, had at his disposal, three major commands, the Shobu, Shimbu and Kembu Groups. Yamashita’s command outnumbered the Allied forces but had to defend a vast territory with limited knowledge of where the Allied forces may land. All that is lacking is for you to kick off one of the largest land campaigns of the Pacific War.

Philippines ’44 is a fascinating title, focused on a rarely covered campaign. There is both a range of operations as well as diverse forces for both sides. Actions ranged from amphibious landings, airdrops (for both sides!) to a range of land actions. The environment and terrain are much more of a hinderance to action than is the case in Europe and the juncture of weather, jungle and other challenges impacts the speed of movement and play.

Philippines '44 includes 76 Scenarios – covering all sizes and situations, including a solo tutorial scenario plus specialized versions for both head to head play and vs. the computer AI.

Philippines '44 provides multiple play options including play against the computer AI, Play by E-mail (PBEM), LAN & Internet "live" play as well as two player hot seat.

name: Family Chess: GOTY Edition
description:
Prepare for loads of fun with this cartoon version of the most popular board game in the world.
Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enjoyed by people of all ages.
If you want to improve on your own, try out one of five difficulty options and play with an NPC. Find your favorite opening and improve with every game. If you are looking for a real challenge try out the expert mode.

This bundle includes 3 DLC skins for the chessboard.

name: Super Hero Fighting Legends: Anime Mortal Battle
description:
This is the ultimate test of your bravery and power and you have to prove yourself as the real superhero fighting immortal Gods!
Get ready for an action packed adventure with the ultimate superhero fighting and missions. Channel your inner action hero and fight all the evil and crime with your best action superhero moves and smart strategies. With arcade and knockout fighting modes that are tougher than ring arena battle, every day unfolds new threats and every minute is full of new challenges. Play in any superhero fighter mode and be the ultimate king of heroes.

name: Fremdganger: The Cheating Demon
description: Burnt out on the dullness of your play sessions, you voyage into the mountains to seek out a legendary Game Master. However, you quickly regret your decision after his game becomes a tad too real and involves you in an unexpected way...

name: The Adventures of LinShanHai: Chapter 2 - Bus Bombing
description: The bus to the suburbs suddenly exploded, the scene was a mess, the sales staff, including all 10 people on board died. Lin Shanhai led the scene investigation team to conduct a detailed investigation and visited all the families and friends of the deceased, but the case is still no clue.

name: Cavimilation
description: Cavimilation is a 2D shooter/platformer throwback to classic high score chasing games with the addition of modern roguelike elements. Explore an endless procedurally generated cave filled with treasure and monsters, where every mistake takes its toll and where every bullet counts.

name: Hentai Sera
description: Hentai Sera is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of serafuku and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Ogre Chambers DX
description: Roguelike bullet hell shooter, where you fend off waves of attacking monsters in a constantly transforming arena. You are rewarded with upgrades to your vulnerable spaceship if you survive long enough.

name: The Abyss
description: The Abyss is a 2D puzzle about descent, in order to pass the levels you need to score a certain number of points and choose the right ways to pass the level.

name: No Way Out
description: Escape the monotony of your daily routine and discover a path beyond this seemingly endless cycle. Embrace the thrill of the unknown, as you embark on a journey to break free from the ordinary. Will you be brave enough to take the leap, even if there seems to be No Way Out?

name: Elven Rivers: The Forgotten Lands - Collector's Edition
description: Celene and her brave teammates have already earn a reputation for themselves: this is why they were chosen to be the first group to explore the neighbouring continent of beastmen.

name: Life is Pain
description: Life is Pain is a 2D platformer with elements of hardcore, dynamic gameplay and abstract graphics in which you need to pass a variety of levels, playing as an alien.

name: Disaster Detective Saiga: An Indescribable Mystery
description: A tale of unnameable calamity by a fiercely unlucky detective! A comical occult horror adventure!

name: The Castle Burns!
description: Kill literally all of the Goblins, Orcs and other monsters with ridiculous oversized weapons and items born from pure insanity in this 2D Roguelike Arena Survival game! Do it fast, because The Castle Burns!

name: 50 Days to Survive
description: Having survived a plane crash, you are the last one alive. You find yourself alone in the middle of a desert, and devoid of all hope. Quickly find what to eat, what to drink, what to shelter you, and improve your comfort of life to avoid death. Can you survive for 50 days? Let's see that.

name: Neko-chan's Club
description: In the Neko-chan's Club, you can meet girls for any taste! Sports tennis player? Or maybe a mysterious ninja girl? Do you like an insatiable Egyptian woman..? Be careful with the last one, she hasn't seen a man for a thousand years! Become a club member with Neko-chans!

name: Come Home: Premium Edition
description: Come Home is a free game and will always be a free game, but this Premium Edition contains loads of extra content, receives updates before the free version, and is a great way to show your support for the game and its developer.

name: The Meme Hunter
description: The Meme Hunter is a dynamic first–person shooter in which you will exterminate crowds of evil memes. They're everywhere. They're out for your blood. They will follow you wherever you go…

name: Urban Flow: Platinum Edition
description: This bundle includes base game, Winter Expansion Pack and London Rules.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty is a historical fantasy action role-playing video game developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo.

Set during a fictionalised version of the fall of the Han Dynasty, the plot follows an unnamed protagonist who battles historical characters and Chinese mythological creatures corrupted by demonic qi.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty (full game)
- Digital Art Book
- Digital Mini Soundtrack
- Season Pass (which includes additional DLCs Battle of Zhongyuan, Conqueror of
Jiangdong, Upheaval in Jingxiang, and Season Pass Bonus Qinglong Armor)

name: Cartoonite
description: Choose your favorite vehicle from an infinite number of possibilities. Have fun crashing into objects to collect resources and build your own world. Show your friends what you've built and do stunts with them.

name: Shita ni
description:
A surreal dream exploration game, both beautiful and terrifying.

Shita ni is a surreal dream exploration RPG Maker game. Through the exploration of both beautiful and haunting dreamscapes, you will uncover the different facets of a young girl's mind. This game will not hold your hand. Instead, you will be free to investigate the mysteries of your surroundings at your own pace in whatever way you see fit.

name: Aquarium Designer: Japan
description: Discover the beauty of Japan with the Aquarium Designer: Japan DLC. Take care of new species of fish, add decorative dragons and celebrate Japanese culture with new stories.

name: Trauma: Broken Paradise
description: Awaken in the fragmented mind of a woman, lost in the shadowy corridors of a sinister mansion. Unravel the mysteries of memory in this gripping psychological thriller, echoing the beloved classics of Survival Horror from the 90s/2000s. Dare to delve deeper.

name: Ro
description: In this adventure, Ro has to run away from many monsters who will attack him. He must jump very skillfully to not fall into the abyss, without using guns or swords, cause Rodrigo is a different hero, a peaceful hero. The only option is dodging the enemy instead of facing it.

name: The Atla Archives
description: The Great City has fallen, and you find yourself clinging to a piece of driftwood in the aftermath. A new nation, Atla, has risen from the ashes.

name: Courier Chief Tycoon
description: Develop the distribution network in your city and turn your warehouse into a big company. Hire motor couriers, deal with customer complaints and at the same time make sure you don't run out of products.

name: Urbek City Builder: Defend the City
description: Upgrade your city militarily so that you can build good defences against bombardment. Plus, new biome: mountains. Try to feed your citizens in a frozen world.

name: Escape Memoirs: Mini Stories - Bunker Scenario
description: This DLC is an additional scenario for "Escape Memoirs: Mini Stories", in which the player must make their way through an old emergency shelter to escape.

name: Dice Hero: The Unoriginal Story
description: Roguelike game where you build up your character to defeat monsters. Use dice as energy to attack and collect items and blessings. Explore worlds and defeat bosses to unlock new progression. Choose your path and playstyle, you never know what's around the corner.

name: Pasha Planet: Reborn
description: “Pasha Planet: Reborn” is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters’ daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay.

name: SokoChess White
description: SokoChess White is a puzzle game about pushing Chess pieces into their destination and overcoming various obstacles. Enjoy 70 different handcrafted levels with a unique twist on the Chess formula.

name: Garten of Banban 2
description: Continue the story of Banban’s Kindergarten. Delve deeper into the bizarre establishment where the place was left suspiciously empty. Try to survive the unexpected residents, all while uncovering the truth behind the place…

name: Gun King
description: Take down hordes of chess pieces to survive and be crowned Gun King. First choose from over 14 guns. Then level up to mix and match a variety of upgrades to create your very own build.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Steelbook Launch Edition
description:
Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty is a historical fantasy action role-playing video game developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo.

Set during a fictionalised version of the fall of the Han Dynasty, the plot follows an unnamed protagonist who battles historical characters and Chinese mythological creatures corrupted by demonic qi.

The Steelbook Launch Edition includes:
- Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty game
- Exclusive Steelbook collectable case
- Bonus DLC items “Crown of Zhurong” and “Crown of Gonggong”

name: Liquid
description: Liquid is a surreal adventure game. When Emma, the actress girlfriend of scientist Albert, dies strangely, police detective Todd investigates the unsolved case, and bizarrely Emma's body appears out of nowhere within many time and space.
